column1: description
When a doctor goes missing, his psychiatrist wife treats the bizarre medical condition of a psychic patient, who knows much more than he's leading on.
An architect and his wife move into a castle that is slated to become a luxury hotel. But something inside is determined to stop the renovation.
On India's Independence Day, a zany mishap in a Mumbai chawl disrupts a young love story while compelling the residents to unite in aid of a little boy.
After accidentally connecting over the Internet, two strangers form a tight friendship – not knowing they already share a bond.
A taxi driver, a gangster and an athlete struggle to better their lives despite obstacles like crooked politicians, evil dons and caste barriers.
A successful writer returns to the town that launched his career, encountering people who spark nostalgic, often painfully illuminating flashbacks.
When a middle-aged divorcee returns to Kolkata to visit his ailing father, long-buried memories resurface, bringing new discoveries with them.
After randomly receiving a handsome political bribe, a sweet, poor elderly woman decides to treat herself a shopping spree, which doesn't go smoothly.
Graduate students Krish and Ananya hope to win their parents' approval before they marry, but the two families clash over their cultural differences.
Four brothers learn that they have inherited ancestral land, but must fight to claim it when a greedy feudal lord threatens to take it over.
While attending one of India's premier colleges, three miserable engineering students and best friends struggle to beat the school's draconian system.
Six friends decide to undertake a grueling mountain trek, only to find that the difficulties in store for them are not merely physical.
Multiple women report their husbands as missing but when it appears they are looking for the same man, a police officer traces their cryptic connection.
Spiced liberally with black comedy, this Bollywood drama follows the lethal love life of a woman who marries numerous men – only to find them flawed.
Four friends shake up their lives when they meet a new woman in their apartment complex who encourages them to embrace their wild sides.
The curious child of idealistic interfaith parents observes an increasingly intolerant world as his family faces financial strain.
A timid man gets unexpected superpowers while trying to save his family's land and a sacred tree from a ruthless tycoon.
A film school graduate is interested in making a movie about his girlfriend's uncle, who claims that he can see his long-dead daughter.
Facing a drought, a hungry tiger and a noble cow have an extraordinary encounter in this fable based on a children’s book and a Kannada folk song.
After receiving an anonymous tip about a bomb, a police commissioner must negotiate with the terrorist, who demands the release of four militants.
When Shaji Pappan and his gang of goofy outlaws find themselves low on funds, they plan to once again win a hefty prize in a tug-of-war competition.
A cop full of self-doubt loses his gun five days before he's due to leave the force, and becomes an unexpected hero as he tries to retrieve it.
A conscientious politician helps an elderly singer overcome the obstacles placed in his path a by a powerful bureaucracy.
An intrepid police inspector forced into a desk job must take matters into his own hands when ruthless criminals are released on a technicality.
When an aging father seeks the help of a doctor and a journalist to look for the son who left him 16 years ago, he learns some surprising truths.
In this high-tension thriller, an anonymous caller on a cell phone threatens to harm a man's family if he doesn't carry out every order.
When a man falls from his balcony, an investigator questions the victim’s family, determined to uncover a darker truth behind the alleged accident.
The decision by India's supreme court to establish caste-based reservations for jobs in education causes conflict between a teacher and his mentor.
When he learns he has terminal cancer, a cynical gambler and chronic smoker ditches his fiancée, snubs doctors and checks into a nursing home to die.
Raised by a kindly thief, orphaned Jimmy goes on the run from goons and falls in love with Jyoti, whose father indirectly caused his parents' deaths.
A municipal clerk with literary ambitions stalks a loan recovery officer on whom he has decided to base his story's central character.
After losing their first child in an accident, a couple moves to a palatial home, where their young daughter comes under the spell of an eerie spirit.
After losing his seventh job in a row, a TV producer and sci-fi buff travels back in time to 1980, where his employment prospects improve.
After being accused of cheating on a reality TV show, a dance troupe seeks to redeem itself by winning the World Hip-Hop Dance Championship.
Thrown out of the elite dance studio he founded, Vishnu's spirits rebound when he sees young street dancers prepping for an annual contest.
Due to family pressure, a corporate man reluctantly marries a woman from the village, but in their new home, she abruptly assumes a different persona.
Sick of his parents’ constant squabbling, a young man travels back in time to the onset of their romance, with plans to set them up for marital bliss.
Trailblazing comic Aditi Mittal mixes topical stand-up with frank talk about being single, wearing thongs and the awkwardness of Indian movie ratings.
A family’s harmonious existence is interrupted when the young son begins showing symptoms of anxiety that seem linked to disturbing events at home.
A boy grows up to become a gangster in pursuit of the mobster who killed his innocent father, but revenge and reparation may come at great costs.
A film crew shooting in a remote forested location begins losing members one by one to a mysterious entity that they cannot see or hear.
Stood up by her groom at the altar, a young woman finds help and healing from another man – until her ex-fiancé returns, hoping to win her back.
During a vacation with her parents, away from her concrete urban existence, a young girl learns to appreciate the joys of connecting with nature.
A happily married business executive is forced to deal with an episode from his past that he had long thought was put behind him.
When his protégé goes rogue and poses a grave threat to the government he serves, a veteran officer of the Indian Army tries to stop him at all costs.
An outspoken, imaginative girl from a conservative family pursues her dream man while fending off the prospect of an arranged marriage.
A young man's obsession with making others happy drives him to help the girl he loves marry someone else, then try to win her heart.
When her small granddaughter is sexually assaulted by a powerful man and no justice is served, a poor, frail old woman plots her violent revenge.
After a public spat with a movie star, a disgraced director retaliates by kidnapping the actor’s daughter, filming the search for her in real time.
After growing up enduring criticism from his father, a young man finds his world shaken upon learning he was switched at birth with a millionaire’s son.
As the police investigate his disappearance, a young man heads to Goa to carry out an act of vengeance fueled by years of pent-up anger toward society.
A simple village man is thrown into a web of political intrigue after he takes on a powerful and ruthless gang of bandits.
When a wolf pup named Runt sneaks off to explore a mysterious cave, he meets and befriends a wolf driven from her pack because she's blind.

Abandoned in a park by their father, Amar, Akbar and Anthony grow up independently and have no knowledge of one another. They're reunited as adults when, by coincidence, they all give blood at the same hospital.
In the age of Buddha and his philosophy of nonviolence, a warmonger king plots the destruction of an enemy kingdom to rescue the woman he loves.
Extensive film clips and interviews tell the story of American filmmaker Ellis R. Dungan, who spent 15 years in India and helped define Tamil cinema.
As a woman scours Hyderabad for her missing husband, she becomes entangled in a conspiracy that suggests there’s more to the mystery than meets the eye.
After being sexually harassed by a drunken politician while performing at a public event, a village dancer plots revenge to clear her name.
Broke and with no concrete plans for the future, two young men discover that a stunning heiress lives nearby and try to charm her into marriage.
A visually impaired pianist’s world careens into a series of shocking twists after he unintentionally lands at the murder scene of a former film star.
As a blind librarian, dispirited cricketer and desolate psychiatrist each seek retribution and release, their lives overlap under eerie influences.
After growing up amidst the gang wars of his hometown, Vincent forms an entrepreneurial squad of his own and ends up on the wrong side of the law.
A photographer invites a close-knit group of female pals to her Goa home to announce her engagement, which stirs up a riot of emotion in all of them.
From his singular career to his personal demons, this biopic chronicles the short yet prolific life of the Marathi dentist-turned-superstar.
Mild-mannered Krishna comes to Mumbai to search for his gang-leader brother, and quickly finds himself in way over his head.
After a distressing incident, a Delhi man vows to believe only what he can see, but his new ideals soon take his life in extreme directions.
A young medical intern sets out to fight for justice after the negligence of the surgeon he looked up to ends in tragedy.
A forger uses a fake identity in trying to retrieve stolen diamonds buried in a penitentiary, unaware a mob assassin is on the trail of his phony alias.
Seeking refuge in a Hindu temple after the tragic death of the girl he loved, a Muslim youth is caught by the police, who mistake him for an enemy.
Raised under the condescending eye of his activist father, an underachieving loafer is lured into the local kingpin’s web of corruption and kidnapping.
When he stumbles upon evil Otto Von Walrus's scheme to melt the Arctic, ambitious delivery fox Swifty assembles a ragtag crew to protect the planet.
This animated retelling of the classic Indian tale of Prince Arjun – part of the Sanskrit epic Mahabharata – begins during the prince's youth.
The grim realities of caste discrimination come to light as an entitled but upright city cop ventures into India’s heartland to investigate a murder.
Entangling the lives of a movie star, a chauffeur, a prostitute and a pimp, this bold drama reveals ugly truths beneath Mumbai’s glitzy veneer.
When a dispute breaks out between five siblings over their mother’s property, one devoted son will go to any lengths to protect her land.
This elaborate Bollywood epic dramatizes one man's transformation from a vengeful and cunning warrior into a legendary leader and teacher of Buddhism.
For a tech-savvy thief, elaborate robberies and evading the police are second nature until a private detective is hired to investigate his latest heist.
A production crew that thinks it's making a documentary about a humble Mumbai rickshaw driver unmasks a horrifying truth about their film's subject.
Disparate characters, including an aspiring time traveler, a phony chef, a drug-addicted waitress and several others, share a surprising connection.
In Delhi, friends from Northeast India prepare a pungent delicacy for a wedding party, sparking conflict and comedy with their unaccustomed neighbors.
With his carefree bachelor days behind him, a young entrepreneur’s ambitions for adulthood come with some painful personal and professional decisions.
This biopic traces the tumultuous life and career of top cricket player Mohammad Azharuddin, who led India's national team in the 1990s.
Orphaned and at loose ends, young Mukesh falls into the seductive orbit of married Sarika, who leads him ever deeper into a world of sex and betrayal.
A young woman eager to avoid an arranged marriage moves to Mumbai, where she learns hard truths about show business, life and love.
In 1975, during the government-declared Emergency, thief Bhawani and his crew plan a daring robbery to reclaim his royal lover's seized treasures.
A martial artist faces his biggest test when he has to travel to Bangkok to rescue the woman he loves from the clutches of his romantic rival.
To avenge his father's death, a young man leads an army into battle against a cruel tyrant in this Hindi conclusion to the historic saga.
Villagers in the kingdom of Mahismati rescue a baby who is destined to embark on a heroic quest in this Hindi version of S.S. Rajamouli's epic.
A wide-eyed graduate learns the ugly side of ambition when he joins in the dubious business practices of his idol, a ruthless Mumbai stock tycoon.
When two sisters travel from Canada to Punjab to visit their maternal family, they discover an opportunity to mend a broken bond with their grandmother.
Through intimate interviews, this documentary explores the stigma facing independent women who seek housing in modern Mumbai.
A young woman who is suspected of practicing black magic and witchcraft is demonized and forced to live apart from her family.
When a woman is accused of killing her lover, a renowned lawyer is hired – but the more they try to  untangle the truth, the more convoluted it becomes.
Heirless Maharaj Brajbhan leaves his throne to his cousin Vikram, but when Brajbhan's wife, Badi Rani, finally conceives, Vikram plots to destroy her.
Sent on the same deadly international mission by their rival religious factions, two men's madcap antics along the way take them hilariously off course.
After futile attempts to better their lives with honest work, three broke friends opt for a more dubious means of making money: kidnapping for ransom.
When she falls in love with the author of a novel she adores, bohemian Bitti enlists the help of a local printer to find her new object of affection.
Years after rejecting Barfii, a hearing and speech impaired young man, for a more "appropriate" suitor, Shruti finds herself falling for him.
A naïve young man and a rich city girl fall in love. Her stepfather, however, doesn't approve of the match and will stop at nothing to split the pair.
An ambitious young athlete endeavors to revive his floundering running career after falling prey to negative influences.
A dysfunctional middle-class family is transformed by the attentions of their talented new chef – until he vanishes along with their valuable jewels.
A young man challenges traditional customs by standing up to the father of the woman he loves, who has promised her to a wealthy expatriate.
A cooly confident aging hit man returns from exile in Paris to his old city, Mumbai, to revisit his past and perform one last job.
After having her heart broken by a man who seduced her at a party, a young, ambitious woman concocts a scheme to get revenge.
A young woman faces pressure to marry her brother-in-law, after her sister dies while giving birth. But she's secretly in love with someone else.
As the 2011 Cricket World Cup begins, three Indians demonstrate their passion and the sacrifices they've made for the country's most popular sport.
A youthful drug dealer in Mumbai must change his ways when the sister who raised him is assaulted by her boss and imprisoned for defending herself.
A theater group lands in trouble when its new actress takes her own life, two of its members are framed for murder and no one is who they appear to be.
This first of a two-part biopic depicts the early years that lay the foundation for beloved Marathi writer and comedian P.L. Deshpande’s iconic career.
The second installment of P.L. Deshpande’s biopic explores the Marathi humorist’s political journey, philanthropic endeavors and personal life.
Married to two women – each unaware of the other – a man finds his double life threatened when an old friend who knows his not-so-little secret arrives.
Determined to bring traditional bhangra to the world stage, a dancer preps for an international competition against a rival with dreams of her own.
In this heart-wrenching coming-of-age story, a young boy embarks on an arduous trek with his debt-ridden father to sell their beloved family donkey.
When his best friend is killed for uncovering political corruption, an idealistic young man decides to become a masked fighter for justice.
Tired of being single, a smart-aleck meme creator has a chance to prove himself to the girl he loves when he is suddenly appointed CEO of her workplace.
Siddharth dismisses warnings that his palace might be haunted, until ghostly occurrences force him to reconsider his beliefs.
After a couple moves into an apartment, the wife’s increasingly disturbing behavior unravels chilling secrets about their new home’s past.
A 23-year-old girl who's married to a man more than twice her age is forced to contend with the predatory nature of a male-dominated society.

An Indian village is abuzz with news that a major movie star is coming to town – even more so because the town barber went to school with him. But as the day of the actor's visit approaches, the humble barber begins to worry he won't be recognized.
Torn between his demanding corporate career, his passion for music and his turbulent family life, a man struggles to keep his inner demons in check.
Inspired by classic and contemporary literature, four renowned Marathi directors create four individual stories in this anthology of short films.
A Istanbul mobster falls for an Indian yoga instructor whose abduction takes him on a wild rescue mission to Mumbai.
When a small-town wedding videographer falls in love, he decides he needs to make more money and turns to shooting sexy videos – with mixed results.
A small-town man takes on a dangerous gangster to avenge his father, a police officer who ended his own life after being framed in a deadly crime.
This docudrama based on the same-titled book tracks the aftermath of a 1993 bombing in Bombay through the eyes of a journalist covering the story.
Ambitious Kunal takes a job in the diamond business, but his life is thrown into turmoil when he's drawn into the seedy underworld of his new career.
When his girlfriend learns the truth about his murky past, a con artist is forced to examine his choices and get to the root of his real identity.
Raj, the son of strict, wealthy parents, falls in love with Bobby, the daughter of a poor Christian fisherman – a romance his parents oppose.
With unlimited determination and zero field experience, a small-town detective accepts a lucrative case from a mysterious – and suspicious – stranger.
Irked by her bodyguard, an heiress invents a secret admirer to throw him off his duties, but the plan may backfire when she falls for him.
An aspiring dancer accompanies her terminally ill mother on one last road trip that alternately strains and strengthens their knotty relationship.
A down-and-out Hollywood actor is utterly unprepared for the eccentricities that await when an Indian producer offers him a role in a Bollywood film.
A PR agent trying to find her stolen phone, a politician in trouble, and a fading celebrity find their lives intertwining in unexpected, messy ways.
A gay man deals with his sexuality, a struggling actor has an epiphany, a boy becomes a dancer, and a man tries to fulfill his father's dying wish.
Following a fashion show mishap, three supermodels find themselves on the run from dangerous gangsters trying to recover a fortune in stolen diamonds.
Disowned by his father as a boy, Surya is taken in by a crime boss. When his brother Shiv is wrongly imprisoned, his father pleads for Surya's help.
This homage to 1980s teen sex comedies follows a college quiz bowl champion who knows almost everything – except how to talk to women.
Childhood friends Abhay and Aaliya experience plenty of obstacles in their paths as they find their way in the world and back to each other.
One filmmaker’s quest to expose the human rights violations faced by India’s LGBTQ community was a project of passion seven years in the making.
Faking his death to escape the realities of his uneventful life worked out well for Brij Mohan – until he was sentenced to death for his own murder.
After a troubled past with their alcoholic father, two estranged brothers prepare to face each other again as rivals in a street fighting tournament.
After getting a heart transplant, a 40-year-old homemaker in Pune makes the life-changing decision to complete the bucket list of her 20-year-old donor.
In this thought-provoking biopic, an idealistic judo trainer adopts a boy from the slums and grooms him into the world's youngest marathon runner.
A child bride grows up to be an enigmatic woman presiding over her household, harboring a painful past as supernatural murders of men plague her village.
Exploring their sexual identities in the face of the patriarchal rules of their Assamese village, a teenager and her two friends are rocked by tragedy.
On the night his ex-lover mysteriously dies, a top fashion designer has a serious accident, raising questions on whether the incidents are linked.

To blow off some steam, friends Akshay, Joshi and Lambodar, posing as a gang called C Kkompany, make a phony extortion demand to Joshi's apathetic son. The trio is shocked when their prank call makes them anonymous celebrities.
Five calendar models try to navigate the twists and turns thrown in their path by the seductive and ruthless world of glamour.
On the incandescent shores of Goa, a young man tumbles down a mind-bending – and soon dangerous – series of trips after taking hallucinatory drugs.
Richi is a director of commercials whose computer memory drive is accidentally switched with that of Sneha, a woman he soon falls in love with.
From a schoolboy’s crush to a middle-aged bachelor’s office romance, four love stories spanning age, religion and status unfold in a small Indian town.
Aboard a spaceship where souls of the deceased are readied for reincarnation, a lone crew member’s rigid existence is disrupted by a spry new assistant.
This documentary explores the worldwide economics of the burgeoning solar energy industry and its impact on hopeful job seekers in the United States.
This documentary chronicles the philosophy and life's work of archivist P.K. Nair, who made a mission of preserving Indian cinema’s rich history.
A vulnerable singer is forced to choose between the girl he loves and another who has developed an unhealthy obsession with him.
With a horde of enemy invaders bearing down, four sons of an illustrious Sikh guru lead a tiny but valiant army into a desperate fight for freedom.
Three petty criminals find themselves in a pickle when police wrongly charge them with the murder of an important politician.
After her fat-shaming husband brings home a new lover, a wife in Maharashtra recruits a group of women to challenge him in a kabaddi match.
When a secretary saves her tycoon boss's life, his family hears wedding bells. Problem is, she's already in love – with his younger brother.

Priya and Raj are polar opposites. Raj is brash and earthy, while Pirya is sophisticated and something of a perfectionist in all she does. They really are like oil and water, but nonetheless, they dare to fall in love.
A local shop becomes a hub for young men taken with the new neighbor. But as business booms, it may leave the equally smitten storeowner heartbroken.
A village schoolteacher and the ghost of a murdered man, who were both betrayed by those closest to them, join forces to help each other.
While taking shelter from a Mumbai monsoon, an investment banker forms an unlikely connection with a naïve prostitute over the course of the night.
Having risen from humble beginnings, an ambitious young man sets his sights on winning a major dance competition that could catapult him to fame.
When pretty new neighbor Seema falls for their shy roommate Sid, jealous womanizers Omi and Jai plot to break up the new lovebirds.
When pretty new neighbor Seema falls for their shy roommate Sid, jealous womanizers Omi and Jai plot to break up the new lovebirds.
Related tales of a family seeking refuge and two men on a train to Amritsar evoke the dreadful unease surrounding Hindu-Sikh tensions in 1980s Punjab.
What could have been a sad journey turns joyful for Rahul when he falls in love with a woman en route to submerging his grandfather's ashes.
An evil demon who traded his freedom for immortality lures Chhota Bheem and his friends to the city of Sonapur with tales of hidden treasure.
Chhota Bheem is in China for a martial arts competition but his real challenge: to save the emperor’s daughter from being kidnapped by the villain Zuhu!
In the wake of his sister's marriage, a young middle-class man leaves his village and learns that supporting one's self is easier said than done.
Eight feisty boys befriend young drifter Fatka. When a mean politician threatens Fatka's way of life, the boys band together in honor of their pal.
At midnight on his 10th birthday, a boy scours the lesser-known Kolkata streets in search of a father he’s never met, carrying a letter he can’t read.
In the turbulent 1930s of British colonial India, a teenager joins a ragtag army of schoolboys determined to overthrow their foreign conquerors.
A bank employee weighed down by her jobless husband's debts — and her own broken dreams — finds a secret source of seemingly unlimited cash in her home.
A gifted but insecure woman embarks on a transformative journey when she enlists an enigmatic con man to recover her stolen car from an eccentric thug.
Mistaking a broke, small-time hustler for a millionaire, two bumbling fishermen hatch a scheme to use him to help pay off their debts.
Jealous of the high regard in which his new wife holds their brother-in-law, a botany professor stages an elaborate prank that will even the score.
A young man in Kerala has two weeks to stop the woman he loves from a fixed marriage in the U.S., but he doesn't have the papers to get there.
Demoted to an academy job, a cop trains five foolhardy students as assassins in his risky revenge plot against police corruption and the underworld.
Low TV ratings drive a well-known journalist to concoct a plan to interview a notorious underworld figure who is also a suspected terrorist.
When Christopher Columbus mysteriously appears in modern-day Kolkata, India, two struggling young men look to him for advice on achieving success.
Seeking inspiration, a young 19th-century painter finds a woman who is his love, his muse and his willing subject, but his work becomes controversial.
Following a misunderstanding, a gangster and his boss part ways and become bitter enemies – with devastating consequences.
Following the death of his wife and daughter in a terrorist attack, an ex-Indian army commando agrees to infiltrate a terrorist cell.
At odds with his radical instructor's ruthless methods, a drama student assembles his own troupe of misfit actors ahead of a prestigious competition.
When his prized bicycle is stolen, an astrologer’s search turns into a journey of self-realization — while the thieves learn a few lessons of their own.
A simple man's peaceful life is complicated when an incident brings him in contact with a gangster and launches his journey into the underworld.
A retired government worker continues to dedicate himself to public service, but his principled ways soon clash with those of his extravagant sons.
A lesbian daughter fights off an arranged marriage in India while an Islamic fundamentalist targets an anti-extremist Muslim scholar in New York.
A once-promising wrestler pursues the gold medal he never won by training two of his daughters to compete at the Commonwealth Games.
In this Bangla thriller inspired by a true story, the discovery of a charred corpse in the woods leads to a high-profile murder investigation.
Stranded in a jungle when their car breaks down, six friends pass their time exchanging horror stories, unaware that they may be part of one themselves.
After returning from school and getting married, a popular farmer begins to arouse resentment and jealousy among those around him.
A surgeon’s perfect life is rattled when his daughter is taken hostage in their own home and he's given 24 hours to pay a hefty ransom.
A father and son bond on an impromptu road trip over deep conversations, unexpected confessions, strange encounters ... and a drunken escapade.
A young cinematographer with a bright professional future and a lack of empathy learns the importance of balancing ambition with humanity.
After failing to win the heart of an aristocrat's widow, a thief plans to abduct her, only to discover that there are others with the same idea.
A man's instant attraction to a woman becomes an obsession as he adopts a friend's identity and even commits murder in order to get closer to her.
Hired by a singer to defend her friend, who has been accused of murder, a formidable lawyer learns that the man he represents may not be innocent.
In the ancient walled city of Delhi, an American-born Indian finds himself on an unexpected inner journey as he learns about himself and his roots.
Three flatmates get involved in the shady business belonging to one roomie's fiancé, and discover that a global crime syndicate is gunning for them.
Because they come from different castes, the son of a tax collector and his true love are not allowed to marry, sending them down divergent paths.
After science student Shesh Shahi – a shy eccentric with a strange connection to nature – is examined by a team of mental hospital doctors, a gripping portrait of schizophrenia emerges.
Tipped off about buried money in Goa, four ne’er-do-well friends go on the hunt, chased by a police officer who wants the treasure for himself.
In a last-ditch effort, the jaded coach of the Southall United Football Club assembles a ragtag team and helps lead the team to a comeback season.
A movie-loving 10-year-old and her blind little brother trek to meet Indian superstar Shah Rukh Khan for help in getting the boy an eye operation.
After learning he was adopted from a Muslim couple, a Hindu man seeks his birth father but finds he must confront his bigotry to realize his quest.
Convinced only a miracle can save them from failing school exams, a trio of friends seek help from a magician. To their surprise, he gamely complies.
In this intimate drama, circumstances draw together four people from different castes – which would normally preclude them from forming friendships.
An accountant and a producer hatch a scheme to finance a movie, while making every effort to ensure that it flops so they may pocket the difference.
A miser’s scheme to set his son up with a millionaire’s daughter backfires when the two actually fall in love — just as his sly charade is revealed.
Inseparable childhood friends Akash, Sameer and Siddharth are just out of college. Nothing comes between them – until they each fall in love.
While hosting a shipboard holiday for relatives and friends, a wealthy but dysfunctional family must face the ugly truths under their flawless facade.
The sophisticated son of a powerful businessman falls for a simple, free-spirited girl whose older sister is in love with him.
A radio broadcaster's intense attraction to a mysterious woman opens the door to a tidal wave of powerful emotions and desires.
Agam Singh's brothers mean everything to him, so while he promises not to marry, he tries to get them to marry – but they want him to marry first.
A young couple falls in love, but conflicting loyalties drive them apart. Years later, fate intervenes and hands them a second chance.
A poor boy grows up to be a famous disco dancer, hoping to use his art to exact revenge on the millionaire who once framed him and his mother for theft.
A struggling math teacher holds down a second job to keep his family afloat. But when he receives a wedding invitation, he's determined to attend.
When a sex worker hires a gay songwriter to care for her disabled son, the ensuing bonds that form offer a complex portrayal of love and family.
A disillusioned Delhi wife and her new-in-town cousin navigate damning secrets, dreams and their thorny dynamic on their respective roads to freedom.
A ruthless crime boss and drug lord is nabbed and held captive by the authorities, who send his naïve look-alike to infiltrate the man's gang.
With Asia under his complete control, criminal mastermind Don turns to Europe, battling the mob bosses of each nation along the way.
When a matriarch wakes from a 30-year coma, her wacky family frantically recreates a bygone era to keep her from noticing how much time has passed.
A village landlord's daughter and an educated commoner must decide if their budding forbidden love is worth resisting a repressive social hierarchy.
To win over a landlady who only accepts women as tenants, two men pose as a couple – but the jig may be up when they both fall for their flatmate.
An unexceptional man becomes a murder suspect when the son of a high-ranking police official who harassed his daughter goes missing.
A notorious thief allies with a street racer for a grand heist involving an elaborate game of deceit with authorities, who have their own dirty secrets.
When one of his colleagues becomes corrupted by power and goes over to the dark side, a young police officer tries to bring the offender to justice.
A lawyer defends his childhood friend – and girlfriend's brother – in a murder case, unaware of his own deep connection to the attorney he’s up against.
Hilarious mix-ups and deadly encounters ensue when a convict seeks to escape authorities by assuming the identity of his doppelgänger, a perky chef.
After kidnapping a millionaire’s daughter, two men get swept up in a power struggle as her father enlists a brilliant cop to hunt them down.
In Goa and in desperate need of cash, four childhood friends get another shot at making their long-abandoned dreams of becoming filmmakers come true.
Two young adults with families on opposite ends of the political spectrum fall in love in a Kerala city torn by violence.
Driven by the lessons he learned from his mother, and the values of the Sikh religion, a man sets out on a mission to serve humanity.
A poor bus conductor's efforts at obtaining information about his enormous electricity bill are hindered by a corrupt system.
Imprisoned for underworld crimes she didn’t commit, a vengeful woman breaks free and goes scorched earth on the smooth-talking suitor who framed her.
While trying to win over his beloved’s parents, a young man is accused of arson, and his father soon realizes insanity may be his only defense.
Indebted to a gangster, a grifter assembles a band of fellow swindlers to attempt his biggest scam yet, but it's soon clear that no one can be trusted.
As her family seeks to marry her off and a hopeful writer pursues her, a small-town woman struggles to reveal the long-hidden truth about who she loves.
Bollywood stars Imran Khan and Kareena Kapoor pair up to play exceptionally dissimilar lovers in this lighthearted romantic comedy.
Journalist Naresh is hired to probe illegal activities on an island. When he's captured, a fellow prisoner gives him a ring with magic powers.
A bank hires an enigmatic and unorthodox debt collector to recover money from four borrowers who are unable to pay their loans.
After accidentally killing a young mobster, a guilt-stricken police officer searches for the parents who never came forward to claim their son's body.
After his brother dies, wealthy Vikram reluctantly returns to India and forms a surprise bond with his orphaned nephew and the showgirl raising him.
When her son comes out to her as gay, a religious mother struggles to reconcile his truth with her own beliefs and their orthodox family values.
When caste differences throw a wrench into their otherwise blossoming relationship, a couple must somehow convince the girl’s father to let them marry.
A young man enlists the help of his friends to avenge his uncle's death by taking on a powerful, unscrupulous politician.
Follow an 11-year-old boy as he goes from ordinary child to colorful competitor in his quest for a big win at India’s biggest kite-flying festival.
Spunky, lower-caste lad Jabya falls for lovely, upper-caste Shalu. But his family's derided social position proves a stubborn stumbling block to love.
A small-town girl finally realizes her dream of becoming a famous supermodel but soon finds there's a price for her glamorous new life.
Killed too soon due to a clerical error in heaven, a man is sent back to earth with a new lease on life, this time in the body of his portly friend.
A father winds up involved with a stolen Ferrari as he tries to acquire the money to send his son to the leading cricket academy.
An all-around nice guy finds himself in a dangerous situation after he makes the ultimate sacrifice for the woman he loves in this drama.
Dylan Mohan Gray examines Africa's AIDS crisis and activists' battle with pharmaceutical companies to make life-saving HIV drugs more affordable.
While she successfully advocates for her female clients in difficult divorce cases, a lawyer’s trauma from sexual assault impacts her own marriage.
Grappling with love and loss in their respective lives, two estranged brothers must confront their traumatic, unresolved past when they cross paths.
A young artist falls for an aristocratic young woman whose bitter mother has trained her in the art of breaking hearts.
Fiza's brother disappears during Mumbai's horrifying 1993 riots. Each day, Fiza and her widowed mother hope that he will return.
A software engineer must decide if he'd rather navigate America's frustrating visa renewal process or simply return to his home country of India.
An ex-cop investigates the death of his best friend and two other spies, killings that lead to a mole operating from India's embassy in Budapest.
A pair of officers with history navigates clues from the past, false leads and a ticking clock to nab an elusive serial killer who targets young girls.
Best friends since childhood, a righteous cop and a lawyer who represents criminals in court become rivals when they fall for the same woman.
Four young male friends tackle the challenges and unexpected catastrophes of growing up clueless in this music-packed Bollywood teen drama.
After a foreboding dream about aliens comes true, a fun-loving trio must prevent human intelligence from being stolen from planet Earth.
After a vengeful college professor targets corruption in the government, he adopts the name "Gabbar" and becomes a hero to a weary public.
An Indian man who has become a major business mogul in Canada must return to his homeland where he's reviled due to being wrongly branded a traitor.
A tycoon accuses three strangers of killing his daughter but mysteriously dies before he can expose them, sparking a tangled hunt for the real culprit.
As a series of murders hit close to home, a video game designer with post-traumatic stress must confront her demons, or risk becoming their victim.
Posted to a small, crime-ridden town, a cop soon learns that cleaning up the system also means confronting the corruption among police and politicians.
The lives of a fundamentalist online troll and a woman reeling from a sex tape gone viral become dangerously intertwined in this provocative thriller.
A Punjabi woman who works on a farm must endure the difficulties of living in an oppressive class-based society and a dysfunctional community.
Despite growing up with traits that set her apart from her peers, a young adopted girl discovers her gift when she takes an interest in spelling bees.
Extreme pressure from his father to excel at school during childhood has dangerous psychological effects on a brilliant but suicidal man’s adult life.
Former con artist Sanju surrounds himself with the finer things, a blissful life troubled by only one thing: his wife, who wants even more.
Framed for his older brother's murder, a boxer seeks violent revenge against the true killer who's torn his family apart.
The directors of Emmy-nominated "Lust Stories" (Zoya Akhtar, Anurag Kashyap, Dibakar Banerjee and Karan Johar) reunite for this quartet of thrillers.
When a new prisoner at a military detention center exhibits eerie behavior, a young interrogator’s search for the truth becomes a battle for survival.
Giving up his life of crime for love, a gangster struggles with a moral dilemma when tragic events and enduring enemies take him back to the underworld.
Eager to marry but constantly rejected by women, a bachelor hopes to win over a former crush by accepting help from an unlikely source: her mother.
When circumstances at work compel Ram to pretend to have a twin, his lie works – until the boss wants his daughter to marry Ram’s fictitious brother.
Hapless brothers Gollu and Pappu stumble into a terrorist plot and end up being ordered to detonate a bomb, a task they are destined to bungle.
A man's relationship with his jealous wife enters choppy waters after he has to spend a night on a yacht with a woman he's rescued from gangsters.
Between thwarting crooks and wooing the belle next door, four pranksters get in over their heads when they bamboozle their way into a couple’s bungalow.
Sriram is concerned only with spending money, until he meets Dia, a principled activist. Now he's determined to prove himself worthy of her affection.
A former freedom fighter is forced to navigate the corridors of a disinterested bureaucracy to prove that he fought in India's freedom movement.
Leaving their wives at home, three randy friends look forward to some raunchy extramarital fun at their college reunion.
Anticipating the next move in a serial killer's grisly game, a police chief realizes that his daughter and estranged wife are the next likely victims.
When a college heartthrob is accused of rape by a less popular student, his girlfriend navigates various versions of the story in search of the truth.
Jailed for drug trafficking while searching for the dad she's never met, a singer gets unlikely support from a crook whose love she has long rejected.
A pampered but kind-hearted average joe ditches his romancing and peacekeeping ways when he’s framed for a murder he didn’t commit.
Flight Lieutenant Gunjan Saxena makes history in her journey from aspiring aviator to India’s first female combat pilot in the Kargil War.
When the daughter of a wealthy family returns from college, she gets a frosty welcome from her brother, who has problems – and plans – of his own.
Ambitious Gurukant Desai ignores his father's advice and leaves his village to find success in Turkey.
After an onstage disaster leaves an illusionist paralyzed, he channels his magic into a hit radio show. Years later, he fights for the right to die.
When a man discovers that he can communicate with his grandfather's spirit, it leads to two love stories intertwining 50 years apart.
Shahid Kapoor delivers a searing performance in this Bollywood take on Hamlet that unfolds amid Kashmiri culture and history.
Small-town Madhav falls for big-city Riya and wants her to be his girlfriend. But she views their relationship differently, and suggests a compromise.
Up against a corrupt government official and crushing poverty, a young boy in the Delhi slums attempts to raise funds to build himself his own toilet.
Love blooms when kind-hearted Avinash takes in Preeti, a woman shunned by society, but the unorthodox living situation creates quite a stir among the neighbors.
Wanting his missing father to come home, a Kashmiri boy repeatedly attempts to call God for help – until one day, a hardened army officer picks up.
Three sisters seem to be ideal brides for three brothers. But when the girls' father won't allow the marriages, the boys use trickery to pull it off.
A revenge-seeking diamond thief gathers a ragtag crew to infiltrate a Dubai hotel hosting a dance contest. But first they have to learn how to dance.
After a career of thankless credits, a retired actor returns for a long-awaited leading role but finds he is utterly unprepared for new-age filmmaking.
A selfish, manipulative schoolteacher takes advantage of a schoolgirl's vulnerability to gratify his dark, narcissistic desires.
Against a backdrop of burgeoning social unrest, a neophyte filmmaker makes history in 1913 as the director of India's first feature-length film.
A young Kashmiri man sets out to escape to Pakistan and make sense of his brother's death, but he drifts aimlessly until finding his brother's camera.
Nikhil is tasked with keeping his fiancée's troublemaking sister, Meeta, from ruining his wedding. But in the process, the two become inseparable.
A millionaire opens the door to comic complications when he punishes his spoiled sons for trying to make money through shady, get-rich-quick schemes.
Stories of personal victories coincide with Team India's battle for the Cricket World Cup in this engaging ensemble drama.
In 1895 Mumbai, spirited Indian lad Shiv Talpade defies British rule and sparse funding – and physics – to build the world's first airplane.
In a politically charged India of the 1970s, three friends are transformed by personal ideologies, dangerous ambitions and matters of the heart.
After receiving a heart transplant from a murdered man, a cop is followed around by the victim’s ghost, who won’t rest until his death has been avenged.
The bond between two crooks and best friends is threatened when one learns that the other's father had a hand in his own tragic past.
One woman experiences the dramatic highs and lows of fame in this voyeuristic glimpse past the glitz and glamour of a Bollywood superstar's life.

Years after an accident at a wild Christmas party traumatized them all, six former friends find themselves trapped in a shopping mall and forced by a killer disguised as Santa Claus to play a lethal game of hide-and-seek.
From romantic pursuits to their friendship, a trio of young men navigate the complexities of relationships while sharing a London apartment.
City girl Veera is kidnapped on the eve of her wedding, but as her captors take her through the countryside, Veera finds herself feeling emancipated.
A young man returns to his native village on a mission of vengeance after his father commits suicide in the wake of false accusations.
In a plot to bait the snake-goddess Nagin for her immortality-granting essence, George States journeys to India and abducts her reptilian lover.
The life of a high-flying law student takes a drastic turn when a bout of misfortune changes his status in society for good.
In the forests of Karnataka, a farmer and his community face eviction from the land when they get caught in the currents of socio-political change.
This offbeat comedy-drama follows six quirky newlywed couples as they set off on a bus from Mumbai to Goa on their honeymoons.
A multigenerational household navigates daily life, evolving relationships and clashes between old and new mindsets in this light family drama.
On a dare, seven college friends spend a night at an abandoned hotel rumored to be haunted and find themselves trapped in a nightmare.
A world-weary man’s self-imposed home confinement becomes a comedy of errors with the simultaneous arrivals of a peculiar package and a curious journalist.
A schoolteacher known for his good deeds and benevolence takes a walk on the dark side after undergoing a heart transplant.
Although Nisha falls for Prem, she agrees to marry his older brother for the good of their families. But fate may have other plans for the lovebirds.
A scheming matriarch plots to cut off her disabled stepson and his wife from the family fortune, creating a division within the clan.
Two kindred spirits who are betrothed to others must decide whether to go through with arranged marriages or brush aside convention for true love.
A small-town girl heads to Delhi to find a designer outfit for the wedding her orthodox father has arranged for her but ends up finding love instead.
A sex-obsessed young man tries to put his past behind him when he falls for an extraordinary woman who makes him want to change his lifestyle.
Three professional friends, all husbands living with domineering wives, take a well-deserved vacation in the resort city of Goa.
Four individuals in modern India grapple with their identities amid social taboos, trauma and brutal sexual discrimination in this quartet of stories.
An intelligent boy born into poverty befriends the son of a once noble family and is inspired by the life of India's president to pursue an education.
This Bollywood spoof recounts the ups and downs of an assistant film director who loathes romance and a designer who adores all things sentimental.
After an actor is hit by a car driven by the police commissioner's sister, his scheming brother-in-law files a bogus suit against the commissioner.
In three stories set in Northeast India, a child goes on the run, a young adult falls in with the wrong crowd and a desperate man turns to crime.
A teen with vitiligo struggles with self-doubt and anxiety until a new schoolteacher sees her through a different lens, and urges her to do the same.
A man returns to his childhood hometown, where he meets the happily married woman he once jilted, while his best friend endures a more volatile union.
A man buys a young girl, code-names her "Doll" and sends her to live with a mother of two who has a mysterious mission to be fulfilled.
An ad agency CEO is put under investigation when his ambitious protégée – and lover – accuses him of sexual harassment, vying for his top position.
A grieving policeman and a rickshaw driver are brought together by a dark, tragic secret that will change their lives forever.
In this fact-based drama, politically motivated cops in Andhra Pradesh set out to frame four Tamil laborers for a crime, torturing them to no avail.
A boy with a hearing and speech impairment – and extraordinary athletic ability – chases his lifelong dream of playing cricket for India.
Bored in their happy marriage, a couple decides to spice things up by fighting more, but their game takes the relationship on an unexpected path.
A young widow is hired as the domestic helper for a wealthy architect, but social divides come to the fore as an unlikely attraction grows between them.
When the duplicitous Rajiv expresses his love for Payal, a cruel lie kicks off a story of self-discovery and unexpected romance.
A young millionaire is willing to do anything to make the schoolteacher he loves happy. Even if it means helping her marry someone else.
A deceitful woman seduces two of her late husband’s crooked friends into helping her hatch a nefarious kidnapping plot for a hefty ransom.
Two young lovers in Banaras are caught in the crossfire of a feud between their powerful families and a political climate destroying their city.
A homemaker and a writer are prime suspects – and the only witnesses – in a double murder, and it’s up to one detective to uncover the elusive truth.
When a mysterious woman hires Shankar to spy on a family, he must determine how his own father's abandonment figures into the situation.
To avoid alimony payments, an aspiring actor schemes for his ex-wife to marry an unlikely suitor, but soon realizes he may not be ready to lose her.
Soft-spoken Jai and spitfire beauty Aditi couldn't be more different – but their family and friends know that they're a perfect match.
A philandering tour guide in Europe begins to develop feelings for one of his clients while helping her search for her lost engagement ring.
Changing fortunes await a wealthy but dejected industrialist when he meets a spirited chatterbox on a train in this breezy Bollywood romantic comedy.
Wishing to settle an old score, a promising soccer player defies his coach’s wishes and leads his team to participate in a violent form of the sport.
An eccentric, self-proclaimed detective goes on an action-packed hunt for his missing father, with an awkward but adventurous journalist by his side.
Sick of keeping their love a secret from their constantly bickering mothers, a young couple seeks to uncover the cause of the women’s longstanding war.
Incarcerated for a crime he didn’t commit, a young man must navigate the crowded, cut-throat environment of prison as he awaits trial.
A gifted young man from a drought-stricken village helps a group of ecologists find water for migrating flamingoes.
When they travel to their father's ancestral village, city kids expecting a natural paradise instead find a poor, dusty town that harbors secrets.
A group of small-town young men run a lucrative phishing operation, until a corrupt politician wants in on their scheme – and a cop wants to fight it.
A couple’s caustic, increasingly jarring interactions over a Mumbai evening strain their relationship until it threatens to break at its fraying seams.
Shinda loves Laali but can't have her, so he and his friends come up with an elaborate plan to solve all their problems and win her.
Without fully realizing the consequences, a boy who wants to relocate from India to Canada sells his heart to a gangster in need of a transplant.
Juggling personal predicaments and workplace woes, three buddies and bandmates practice for their ultimate dream: winning a coveted music competition.
An Indian man in Canada marries a local citizen to legalize his immigration status. The only problem? His girlfriend isn't thrilled about his new wife.
In 16th-century India, what begins as a strategic alliance between a Mughal emperor and a Hindu princess becomes a genuine opportunity for true love.
Truth and fiction blend in this quasi-documentary about six exhausted workers at a Mumbai call center servicing U.S. customers.
A bank manager and his wife, still grieving over their daughter who died in a fire, become pawns in a bank heist with ties to corruption and fraud.
A remote village situated neither in India or Pakistan becomes its own republic after inmates at the local mental asylum bust loose and take over.
In this quiet, wistful drama, a woman on her deathbed searches her fraying memories for love and fulfillment through surreal, meditative tableaux.
The wounds of a traumatic childhood and a corrupt, unjust system push a young man into becoming a cold-blooded, ruthless gangster.
Framed by a politician for committing murder, a lower-class boy hires the only counsel he can afford: a lawyer with no courtroom experience.
Separated at birth, a pair of identical twins unexpectedly reunite as adults and embark on a madcap mission to take down a common enemy from their past.
Separated at birth, twins Raja and Prem couldn't be more different. But when fate puts them both in London, they start being mistaken for each other.
The happy life of a young blind couple is shattered when the wife is raped and corrupt police won't help, sending the husband on a quest for revenge.
When an activist begins aiding a shrewd political advisor — also his girlfriend’s father, personal agendas lead to betrayal as love and duty clash.
Star-crossed lovers from different social strata struggle to overcome differences in class and family expectation, as well as a long separation.
In this zany comedy, a man is torn between the girl he loves and the respective women his warring mother and grandmother have chosen for him to marry.
Trapped in a national park, a tiger expert and a group of hunters turn to an enigmatic local for help when they mysteriously begin to die one by one.
When a restless spirit curses a village that has a history of female infanticide, the town's fate lies in the hands of a 10-year-old girl.
Jailed for robbing his brother’s unscrupulous employer, a simpleton has a transformation while in prison, emerging with a violent mission for revenge.
An aggressive, wayward fisherman abandons his wife and daughters, who grow up to face the consequences of their father's mistakes.
In this Hindi version of the Tamil blockbuster, a Tamil gang leader in Kuala Lumpur seeks justice for crimes committed against him and his family.
Unhappy in their respective marriages, an ex-footballer and a teacher find true love in each other, but guilt, jealousy and tragedy cloud their affair.
A dreamer falls for a girl who is in love with someone else and tries to create a rift between her and the man she loves.
Years after his father disowns his adopted brother for marrying a woman of lower social standing, a young man goes on a mission to reunite his family.
An exalted but short-fused surgeon plunges into a spiral of drugs, alcohol and rage after his intense relationship with his girlfriend turbulently ends.
While visiting India for her cousin's wedding, a Canadian girl develops strong feelings for a boy from a lower caste.
Pregnant and alone in the city of Kolkata, a woman begins a relentless search for her missing husband, only to find that nothing is what it seems.
This Bollywood drama tells the story of three best friends who dream of starting a cricket training academy in Ahmedabad for very different reasons.
A popular singer on the run poses as a bartender and falls in love with a prostitute, but their love is threatened by a violent incident in his past.
An uptight MBA student falls for the charismatic new neighbor who charms her troubled family – but he has a secret that forces him to push her away.
Cheenu dreams of resurrecting the restaurant he has inherited to its former glory, but his brother, a compulsive gambler, loses the place to a cop.
A scientist trying to solve one of the universe's greatest puzzles begins a romance with a much younger colleague that's haunted by a dark secret.
A young man pursues his dreams of wealth by breaking the law, while his twin brother tries to better his life through hard work and honesty.
Despite doubts from fellow villagers who think he’s crazy, an ambitious dropout commits himself to solving a persistent local electricity crisis.
A carefree racing enthusiast’s womanizing ways end when he meets the girl of his dreams, but their newfound peace is disrupted by a dangerous killer.
Returning home to visit their ill grandfather, two estranged brothers must confront their unresolved rivalry while their parents’ marriage frays.
Falling into an over-the-phone romance with a rickshaw driver, a young woman visits his city when an encounter with a stranger derails their meeting.
Unlucky in love and bullied at work, an office drone is resigned to his dead-end life until it’s transformed by mysterious calls from … himself.
When flashbacks reveal that he's the reincarnation of a man murdered by his wife, rock star Monty sets out to get revenge for the decades-old crime.
Secretly in love with his neighbor, a mild-mannered clerk is heartbroken when his much bolder, more charming friend wins her heart instead.
After falling in love during college, architect Maddy and free spirit Payal have five wonderful years together, until a mystery suddenly divides them.
When a late poet leaves behind his property to a young man, the man's brother suspects the poet may have been more than just a family friend.
Wrongfully accused of murder, two students' last hope lies with their defense attorney, an inexperienced bumbler who's never even tried a case.
As his children plot his death to claim their inheritance, an aging patriarch leaves home, befriending a spunky boy who adds direction to his life.
Fusing his musical and stand-up chops, Kenny Sebastian gets analytical about frumpy footwear, flightless birds and his fear of not being funny enough.
A prison guard goes undercover as a dancer to try and recapture an escaped criminal and restore her police inspector boyfriend's reputation.
An embittered former hockey star must engage with the sport again to help his brother assemble a team for a momentous match against the British.
A free-spirited doctor is hired to assist an injured king and winds up challenging his family's tradition-bound lifestyle as she falls for his son.
As a crazed killer blazes a trail of blood through an anxious city, a hardened cop aims to take him down by any means in this remake of “Dirty Harry.”
A cranky control freak must rely on his comically dysfunctional family to pull off a scam on a greedy land shark who's stolen his prized property.
A strict matriarch's regimented household is upended by the arrival of a spunky relative who challenges the rules.
While playing matchmaker to a pair of their friends, two young university students begin developing feelings for each other.
A 15-year-old girl with autism attempts to write a mystery novel based on her hunt for the killer of a neighborhood cat.
Growing up poses challenges for Chinu when he moves from city to country and encounters a youth culture far different from what he's used to.
A man's decision to marry three women, to keep them from committing suicide, complicates his relationship with his girlfriend.
A bitter family battle ensues between a father and his sons when a businessman makes a deal that entices farmers to sell off their properties.
A man finds his lucky charm in the form of a woman whom he had once clashed with on every level, but on whose presence he must now rely to succeed.
Star athlete Rohan has his eye on a beautiful art student. But when his best friend Simran experiences a crisis, he drops everything to help her.
The speech-and-hearing-impaired heiress of a palatial mansion must rely on basic instincts when a masked invader is determined to kill her.
A speech and hearing-impaired couple persists through unforgiving obstacles to be accepted by society and live a life of dignity.
In three tales about fear, a baby elephant gets captured by a circus, two boys enter a haunted house and a parrot faces his fear of flying.
Torn between his past and present girlfriends, a confused bachelor’s indecisiveness spins a web of lies and cheating as he struggles to commit.
True love is put to the test when another woman comes between a pair of star-crossed young lovers in this thriller.
When a busy workaholic leaves town to meet friends, an unexpected delay leads him to the hut of an old man, whose haunting tale could change his life.
A student tries to steal a test from a teacher's home, leaving him for dead after an accident. A string of murders may be the professor's revenge.
Per her mother’s last wish, a girl sets out to reunite her father with the college best friend who loved him – only to discover the woman is engaged.
Accused of killing a politician, a local grocer’s fight to prove his innocence reveals his lifelong struggles with injustice leading up to the incident.
Two mismatched archaeologists battle a team of vicious mercenaries in a race to discover an ancient Tibetan treasure of unimaginable worth.
When a young Indian couple moves to the American suburbs, they are shocked to discover that they've become enmeshed in a secret terrorist plot.
A young university student's world is shaken after her brief involvement with a wealthy playboy results in her pregnancy.
Longtime friends Rahul and Karan head to Mumbai intent on making their dreams come true, but both men are suddenly saddled with bad luck.
When an unlikely porn actor falls for a woman outside the industry, he employs his co-stars as a stand-in traditional family to impress her father.
The life and career of a lawyer are thrown into chaos when his son's wish magically renders him incapable of telling a lie.
Cinematic lovebirds Aishwarya Rai and Vivek Oberoi star in this love story about a sweet young girl, Diya, brought up by her widowed father on a coffee plantation in the village of Coorg.
Eager for cash, Rajesh joins his friend Shankar's blood-theft operation. As Rajesh's greed grows and the cops close in, Shankar is poised to explode.
A man who hopes to bring light to his village must compete with an officer from the electricity department to win over the love of his life.
Born amid poverty and limited women's rights in the village of Ratu, India, Deepika Kumari rose to become the No.1 female archer in the world at 18.
In 1890s India, an arrogant British commander challenges the harshly taxed residents of Champaner to a high-stakes cricket match.
After dropping out of the army, a spoiled teenager reenlists and proves his mettle by becoming an officer just as war breaks out.
A vain, self-righteous nobleman falls in love with a village girl and tries to transform her into his version of the ideal woman.
Industrial workers struggle against the greed of their employers and the apathy of the government toward the conditions in which they live and work.
The spirit of a murdered woman contacts four bachelors, enlisting their help to find her killer.
Addicted to webcams and voyeurism, a married man gets more than he bargained for when an online stranger tries to force him to watch a suicide.
A woman from a small mountain village disobeys her village elders and sets out for the big city in search of her missing husband.
A group of Mumbai up-and-comers search for love and struggle for success in this ensemble drama that centers on an eager young call-center executive.
A vengeful son, a cop on a mission, a wannabe actress and a jilted lover find their lives intermingling in unexpected ways over 24 hours in Mumbai.
When authorities jail his son for rejecting religious bias, a poor father’s struggle to bail him out highlights rural India’s enduring casteism.
A woman who's about to give birth finds her maternal instincts kicking in when she's abducted, imprisoned and brutalized by a vicious gang.
This documentary follows eight women in India who struggle with self-confidence and society's expectations but rediscover themselves through running.
Director Steven Spielberg takes on the towering legacy of Abraham Lincoln, focusing on his stewardship of the Union during the Civil War years.
A disillusioned rickshaw driver in Punjab dreams of moving to Dubai, but his plan to butter up his would-be benefactor goes horribly wrong.
Lives are upended when a hiking trip leads a Wall Street hotshot to explore his true feelings for an old pal who’s disenchanted with his boyfriend.
Under a government initiative, a retired alcoholic soccer player is sent to establish a soccer team in a politically troubled area.
When professional ambitions clash with personal feelings for a modern-day couple, a love story from a bygone decade may offer some wisdom.
A sexually inexperienced rickshaw driver struggles to build intimacy with his shy new wife in their tiny, overcrowded quarters.
Not romantically inclined, a popular radio personality finds herself caught between two diametrically opposed suitors.
Individually, bank employees Sanjay and Karina don't earn enough to be able to buy a home, so they decide to enter into a marriage of convenience.
This provocative drama examines how the voyeuristic nature of modern society affects three unusual couples in Northern India.
When Vikram gets tapped to play the male lead in a Bollywood film, he can't believe his luck. But it may ruin his relationship with his girlfriend.
When his friends make a bet that he can woo his college crush, a lovesick student named Luckee struggles between satisfying his heart and hormones.
After being arrested for a crime he didn't commit, an aspiring musician teams up with some of his inmates at Lucknow Central to form a band.
During an uprising in Russia's St. Petersburg, teen girl Lucky meets handsome Aditya, the Indian ambassador's son, and together they flee the chaos.
From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.
Pretending to marry in order to cohabitate, a small-town couple lands in endless awkward situations to hide the truth from their orthodox families.
Haunted by disturbing visions, a workaholic takes a vacation with his family, but a detour leads them to an unsettling stranger and chilling events.
In the companion to 2013's "Bombay Talkies," four short films by four of India's biggest directors explore love, sex and relationships in modern India.
Fleeing London to evade a gangland debt collector, Omi Khurana returns to his native village in India, passing himself off as a successful lawyer.
The relationship between a journalist and a lawyer she meets while investigating a story grows complicated as she uncovers layers of deception.
On his first visit to his home city of Kolkata in 13 years, a Paris-based chef is faced with a cooking challenge that will change his life forever.
After relocating to a different town with her husband, a housewife begins to sense the existence of a mysterious presence in their new house.
A bridge under construction collapses in Mumbai, killing a man's family and launching him on a crusade to bring those responsible to justice.
After a trip to China, a struggling entrepreneur returns to India as the supplier of an illegal aphrodisiac — but all he ends up stimulating is chaos.
The story of making "Lagaan," one of the millennium's seminal Indian films, is told from the point of view of production team member Satyajit Bhatkal.
An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.
An industrialist's daughter is forced to marry a rich heir by her greedy grandmother as her adopted sister bonds with the charismatic wedding planner.
Two young brothers encounter a singing bird who treats them to a musical reinterpretation of one of India’s most epic ancient tales.
A financially troubled Indian man heads to Singapore to find employment, while his pretty wife stays behind in a move that could cause trouble.

Major Ram Prasad Sharma yearns to see project Mission Milaap come to fruition and usher in an era of peace between two warring countries. But the evil Raghavan will do anything to stop the peace process.
An ordinary-looking guy weds the woman of his dreams, but his jealousy threatens to destroy their union in this lighthearted tale of marital mismatch.
After lying to his girlfriend, orthopedic surgeon Samir must conjure up a pretend wife in this musical comedy.
When the son of a wealthy businessman and the daughter of a struggling engineer fall in love, the young man's parents question the girl's motives.
With their relationship running on autopilot, a discontent husband and wife must confront their issues while on a trip with the extended family.
Class divides become thorns in the budding romance between the crony of a nativist Mumbai politician and the new, North Indian resident of his chawl.
Years after a police encounter separates him from his lover, an angry young man goes on a killing spree, with an equally vengeful cop on his heels.
A self-trained engineer risks debt, love and reputation in his quest to improve the grueling work conditions of his mother and her weaving community.
Forbidden love, fraying loyalties and flagrant hypocrisy emerge when sanctimonious politicians drive a madam’s brothel from the heart of Hyderabad.
With the assistance of a psychiatrist, an acclaimed filmmaker struggles to come to terms with a mysterious romantic trauma.
When his unlucky horoscope doesn’t bode well for his future wife, an earnest bachelor goes to surprising lengths to get the family he’s always wanted.
While prepping for a family wedding, a young man falls for his sister’s friend, who has already been promised to someone else.
Under pressure to marry, a perennial bachelor hires a much younger woman to act as his fiancée, but her bond with his family throws his plan for a loop.
A smooth talker falls for a music teacher aboard a cruise, but a cruel twist of fate hinders their plans to meet again months later.
A government employee and aspiring crime writer, who is under investigation for corruption, is asked by a politician's wife to spy on her husband.
After getting fired, a police officer connects with a prostitute he met on the job in a red-light district and sets out to keep her off the streets.
The controversial and troubled Indo-Pakistani writer Saadat Hasan Manto finds his artistic choices challenged by censors.
Four stories by writer Sadaat Hasan Manto culminate in a single gruesome drama that's set during the partitioning of the Indian subcontinent.
An Indian business owner struggles to keep his company afloat amid global competition while trying to make up for lost time with his family.
The relationship between a painter and his admirer unfolds as an abstract, twist-filled hide-and-seek game against the backdrop of murder and revenge.
When caste discrimination prevents a villager from giving his deceased father a rightful burial, he takes his fight for equality to court.
When his wife goes missing, university professor Saurabh remains at home while the police investigate, but his grip on reality loosens as days pass.
After a young man charms the girl he loves into accepting his proposal, an accidental swap on their wedding day leads him to marry the wrong bride.
This documentary reveals the cracks in India's anti-dowry act and gives voice to both women and men who've been victimized by the law's abusers.
The daughter of a poor rice farmer overcomes the objections of her father and the demands of a male-dominated society to pursue a career in boxing.
Determined to make it in showbiz, an aspiring young actor considers turning his back on the beloved Irani café run by his family for generations.
A loving husband and father's joyful family life is rocked to its core upon the discovery that he has a young son borne from a past extramarital affair.
A jealous, possessive mother thinks she is competing with her new daughter-in-law for the affections of her overindulged son.
An unconventional police officer faces off against a gang of thugs as he tries to bring order to the far-flung village he’s been stationed in.
A beautiful, wealthy woman’s insatiable appetite for romance leads to tragedy and a police investigation.
An orphan girl who has ambitions of marrying a rich man changes her identity to win the heart of a prominent businessman's son.
A professor mysteriously vanishes, leaving behind a host of suspects, a shadowy history and a clue: the anonymous birthday gift of a Bengali classic.
In the early 1990s, the love between a cassette shop owner and a traveling circus performer challenges caste barriers and disapproving parents.
After recovering from a tragic experience, a young woman makes a journey to her father's homeland and falls in love with a kind-hearted doctor.
When his mother suffers a traumatic incident, a boy from the Mumbai slums treks to Delhi to deliver his written plea for justice to the Prime Minister.
In southern India, a laborer's dreams of owning a piece of land to farm is complicated by political corruption.
A detective arrests a doctor for crimes targeting medical professionals but later finds the real culprit in a tale of revenge, corruption and magic.
Disgusted by the gold-chain snatchers in his home city of Chennai, a man vows to combat the criminal menace by taking the law into his own hands.
After a disgruntled man blames his Marathi heritage for his lack of his success, he is visited by Shivaji, a great medieval Marathi king.
After a dedicated cop accidentally kills a 12-year-old boy, he's fired, harassed and forced to take menial work as he tries to keep his life together.
Mighty Raju preps for a new adventure in Rio de Janeiro, where he goes toe-to-toe with rival soccer players, faces capoeira fighters and more.
A nameless widow juggles multiple jobs to support her daughter’s decision to study abroad, only to discover that she has other plans.
A modern love story is connected to an ancient folk tale as star-crossed lovers from different social classes are kept apart by their families.
Mistaking the sleeping passenger on his train for a drunk, a young man posts a picture of him online, unaware of his impulsive act's ugly repercussions.
Uprooted to America, an aspiring Indian entrepreneur confronts disapproval, sexism and rivalry as she draws from her culture to start a tea business.
A television journalist makes a risky career move by accepting a job offer from a controversial Istanbul television station.
After investing in a shady deal that quickly falls apart, a morally flexible real estate agent involves his wife in a dangerous recovery plan.
A courageous villager moves to the ancient city of Mohenjo Daro, where he falls for the daughter of a priest and does battle with a tyrant.
After her stepdaughter is sexually assaulted at a party, a furious mother sets out to destroy the lives of the four perpetrators who walked away free.
When a teenager discovers he's not really human, he ventures out to a remote island to explore his roots and confronts a series of wild challenges.
Two communities in Mumbai get a final chance to compete with each other in the celebration of the iconic Ganesh Chaturthi festival.
Pushing 40 and unemployed, a Dubai returnee desperate for a wife catches the eye of a Bhopal belle, who sees him solely as her ticket out of India.
When three brothers unwittingly get entangled in a murder associated with a fraudulent ashram leader, they set out to expose him to society as a fake.
Motu and Patlu want to help a circus lion get back to the jungle. On the way, the three become caught up in an exciting adventure in the forest.
When the lives of a carefree boxer and his cabdriver dad collide with the ambitions of a ruthless businessman, a search for answers turns to revenge.
When a doctor gets jailed for a string of shocking murders, his loyal wife sets out to commit a copycat crime to prove his innocence.
Chaos ensues after two orphaned twin brothers raised apart team up with their eccentric, unmarried uncle to find a solution to their romantic woes.
A martial arts specialist accidentally becomes a superhero when he steps in – in costume – to help the cops catch a criminal.
Samir must overcome a hostile horoscope, a hot temper and a determined rival to win the heart of Rani, the love of his life.
Jailed as a teenager, Shankar has been unable to stay on the right side of the law ever since, despite his wife's pleas and his mother's rejection.
This coming-of-age tale follows Rahul, a young boy growing up in a Mumbai slum whose alcoholic father abuses him and his mother.
In Delhi for the first time, a Mumbai girl loses her phone but gets a surprise chance at true love with a local boy who begrudgingly helps her.
Still a virgin at 32 years old, a frustrated advertising agent gets the shock of his life when an unlikely chain of events turns him into a porn star.
A moving portrayal of the 2006 train bombings in Mumbai, this Indian drama follows the interconnected stories of several strangers.
When they both fall for the same girl, best pals and shameless womanizers Prince and Jassi go head-to-head to compete for her love.
God-fearing Pandit Krishna Kant loses everything and turns to a life of crime after his landlord tries to rape his wife and tears his family apart.
A young man and his parents ponder the reasons behind the recent breakdown of a relationship he was in – and the possibility of reconciliation.
When jingle composer Nanda's car breaks down on his way to Chennai, he hitchhikes there with Arjun, who tries to rope Nanda into a shady deal.
A dejected small-town music teacher grapples with guilt and regret when his ex-pupil who once loved him returns home as the star he always wanted to be.
Through interviews with locals, this documentary investigates the triggers and outcomes of the 2013 communal riots in the heart of Uttar Pradesh.
