After a wild night of impulse and infidelity, advertising executive Rajiv Kaul must navigate the blurred lines between life, death, fact and fiction.
After being diagnosed HIV-positive, a champion swimmer is disowned and harassed by all except his loving sister and loyal boyfriend.
A bright-eyed villager comes face-to-face with the gritty realities of modern-day Mumbai when he sets out to find his childhood friend.
After losing her father, a young woman moves to the city to earn money. When she finds a job at a mysterious bungalow, her worst nightmares come true.
A father leading a dark double life and his daughter, who's eager to pursue her studies in Hyderabad, face the tragic consequences of sex trafficking.
A fiery young woman accepts help from a spy agency to avenge her lover's murder. In return, she must prove herself as one of their top recruits.
After his sleeping disorder hinders him from protecting his girlfriend, a man sets out to take revenge on the thugs who attacked her.
This documentary examines the naked yoga gurus of India whose devout spiritual practice connects them to the eternal, transcending the material world.
While loyally defending his boss from mobsters trying to kill him, a naive, hotel bellboy discovers the family he never knew he had.

To her Indian parents' dismay, London-born Jasmeet "Jazz" Malhotra longs for everything Western, including her British boyfriend. On a family trip to India, her father arranges Jazz's nuptials to Arjun Ballu Singh, who's smitten with his new bride.
A teenage boy becomes smitten with his new drama teacher and pursues her, despite the perilous risks of being found out.
Reeling from the loss of her husband, a widow struggles to fulfill her physical and emotional desires despite social taboos around female sexuality.
A veteran Shakespearean actor steps off the stage and into the painful tragedy of old age, facing ungrateful family and his fleeting legacy.
When three different boys propose to a lively, strictly reared girl who yearns to be a performer, she agrees to marry the winner of a singing contest.
When her friend’s rapist evades punishment from the law, a determined young woman takes revenge into her own hands in this story based on real events.
When a blind chef’s girlfriend goes missing, his unnerving search for her leads him to find there's more to her disappearance than what meets the eye.
Clashing views on intimacy lead a couple to go their separate ways to reflect on commitment and companionship, before suddenly crossing paths again.
With numbers written on a doll as their only clue, three officers of the law track down a psychotic killer, unearthing dark secrets along the way.
When a cabbie chances upon his childhood sweetheart, he tries to rekindle old feelings but finds that mature love is a more complicated matter.
Yearning for a lavish life abroad, an entitled, lazy sexist crafts a scam to ditch his thankless nursing job and find a wealthy spouse to secure a visa.
After a prank goes sideways, three buddies find their relationships  – with women and each other – tested in unexpected ways.
This thriller tells the true story of model Jessica Lall – who was shot dead in a restaurant – and the campaign to bring her killer to justice.
When he lands the lead in his Christian school's production of "The Merchant of Venice," a secretly gay student is bullied by wealthy upperclassmen.
When Norm the polar bear is framed for a crime he didn’t commit, his friends step up to help him clear his name.
Before planning an awesome wedding for his grandfather, a polar bear king must take back a stolen artifact from an evil archaeologist first.
While trying to buy his wife a set-top box, a struggling writer and his pal get entangled in the domino effect of a spectacularly botched drug deal.
A penniless actor new to Mumbai and a beautiful woman he meets one fateful night try to stop a gangster from replacing India's president with a twin.
Mumbai shopkeeper Kanji Bhai files a lawsuit against God when an earthquake destroys his store and his insurance policy won't cover the damage.
A surly septuagenarian gets another chance at her 20s after having her photo snapped at a studio that magically takes 50 years off her life.
Reincarnated 30 years after being killed in a suspicious on-set fire, a small-time actor is determined to punish the person who ignited the blaze.
Based on photographer Michael O’Neill’s book of the same name, this documentary traces the author’s 10-year journey through the landscape of yoga.
Seeking to heal after a traumatic assault, a young woman retreats to a small village by the hills, where she finds hope, love and new purpose.
After a chance phone call leads to daily conversations, a widowed restaurant owner and a lonely film actor plan to finally meet in person.
Mumbai's top mob boss rules the underworld with honor and compassion, but his power-hungry protégé will shake up the world of organized crime.
This turbulent sequel to Once Upon a Time in Mumbai carries on the saga of the gangland don Shoaib Khan, who continues pressing for more control.
When his partner is killed, a young cop is forced to care for the man's four children, and solicits the help of a woman who moves in with them.
The lives of a Mumbai man and woman who are both dealing with issues intersect through a TV dance show that she wants to win but he wants to sabotage.
A former judge in retirement finds and punishes the culprits he could not convict in court, spurring a crime branch officer to investigate.
An obsession with a woman with whom he had a one-night stand brings disharmony into a man's life and destroys his peace of mind.
When the village's biryani cook unexpectedly passes, a widow steps up to the plate and takes on new delectable challenges.
Taken into custody, a murder suspect's theatrical explanations of his peculiar modus operandi unearth truths far beyond the crime he’s accused of.
Young orphan Kuttappayi goes to live with his grandfather in the country, but his new life takes a hard turn when his grandfather's health fails.
Starting as a petty thief, a man rises to become one of the city's biggest operators and carves out the kind of lifestyle he'd once only dreamed of.
A prostitute who is down on her luck gets caught in the middle of an elaborate scheme orchestrated by two local politicians.
Paan Singh Tomar goes from celebrated runner to star brigand and rebel when life after sports fails to unfold as planned.
A face painter for Theyyam rituals who is himself disfigured conceals his guilt over the fact that he performs abortions as a medical practitioner.
At times dark, at times disturbing, four short films explore stories of those who dare to dream and desire — and those determined to stand in their way.
Despite public humiliation and resistance, an entrepreneur markets a hygienic, low-cost sanitary pad that even India's poorest women can afford.
In the underbelly of a Delhi neighborhood, a woman’s search for her missing lover collides with drugs, death and a coach grappling with his demons.
Traditional Indian folklore comes alive in this charming film based on a story by Statwart Vijaydan Detha.
Fleeing unrest in their native Nepal, three young siblings separated from their parents must beat the odds to survive on their own in India.
Looking for a way out of his impoverished life, a lowly hotel waiter joins an underground fight club. Then he needs a way out of that.
In 18th-century India, a Maratha commander leads his army in preparation for a fierce battle against Afghan invaders in this film based on real events.
After witnessing a murder, a meek family man must summon his courage when he finds himself on the wrong side of a notorious gangster.
Prompted by loyalty, Arjun plays matchmaker between his philandering foster brother and a conservative girl but winds up falling in love himself.
As the parents of three unmarried daughters, a humble cook and his wife contend with the challenges of matchmaking and social expectations.
A dedicated government official puts his career in jeopardy by insisting that India become a nuclear power, a goal that powerful forces resist.
A talented young Indian cricket player must defy his father's wishes to play for the side of England, a rebellion his siblings quietly cheer.
A wealthy businessman's miserly habits cause no small amount of stress and embarrassment to his family, particularly his daughter.
Desperate for a place to live, twentysomething bachelors Parikshit, Jayesh, Parag and Bhavesh finally locate a house to rent, only to learn that the landlords will consider married applicants only.
Complications around the cremation of their deceased friend inspire three septuagenarian friends to build their own mortuary.
Two indigent farmers consider suicide so that their families can collect a government subsidy that's paid to the relatives of deceased farmers.
At a Lucknow college, an aspiring football player’s dream of playing nationally is threatened when he faces discrimination for his Manipuri background.
An affable, newly appointed college warden proves to be no ordinary man when an old enemy resurfaces and exposes his complicated, violent past.
India's primary intelligence agency sends an enigmatic operative on a top-secret mission to avenge the 11/26 terrorist attack on Mumbai.
In this Bollywood entertainment, two journalists, Ajay and Ria, work for rival TV stations and compete heavily to mask their feelings for each other.
Driven by greed, three rich friends seek to double their wealth and find themselves indebted to a ruthless gangster.
The paths of a man and a woman, who have both been recently divorced from their spouses, intersect at an art exhibition in London.
Posing as her bubbly identical twin for a quiz contest, a shy student crushes on a fellow participant, who falls for her — thinking she’s her sister.
Struck by the lack of clean resources for menstruating women in his village, a jobless loafer braves social stigmas to create low-cost sanitary napkins.
A two-year-old must fend for herself when her mother suddenly passes away while her father is gone for a conference, leaving her prone to danger.
As a lonely widower prepares to leave India to live with his children in America, he looks back on past memories and unfinished business.
A sexual assault victim, unjustly tried for the attempted murder of her attacker, is defended by a retired lawyer who challenges India's rape culture.
Thakur Avadh is an evil landlord in a remote village who rules with an iron fist. His two sons live a debauched life, knowing that their father will bail them out of any scrape.
A pizza delivery boy who doesn't believe in the supernatural is forced to confront his convictions after being trapped in a house on his route.
Aamir Khan teams with director Rajkumar Hirani to play a social crusader in a political satire on the state of corruption in India.
Learning of a fortune in gold being secretly shipped to Romania, master thieves Charlie and Riya assemble a crack team to steal it.
When a woman arrives in Mumbai and hires three spirited boys to care for her estate, she discovers they're more trustworthy than her family members.
In a town infamous for female infanticide, a young woman’s arrival has local bachelors vying for her hand in marriage — but she has a bigger agenda.
Three men are stunned to find their faces on a poster promoting vasectomies, and must prove to their upset loved ones that they're innocent victims.
Retired, restless and constantly butting heads with his son, a former stuntman escapes on a road trip that becomes a journey to find his first love.
The chaotic ramblings of a young architect's mind take hold of his life as he leaves behind his past in India to work in Prague.
Aspiring to fulfill his father’s dream and become a civil services officer, a young man loses his way upon becoming entangled with a criminal lynchpin.
While recovering from an assassination attempt four days prior to his coronation, a stern prince is replaced by a joyful and generous doppelgänger.
A man and a woman struggling to keep their respective marriages afloat run into each other at a marriage counselor's office, with unexpected results.
To better himself, a spoiled prince temporarily assumes a commoner’s identity. But he soon learns his palace has been gifted to his father’s new wife.
A college grad in need of money must disguise himself as an old man to tutor two young women who are under the watchful eye of their strict aunt.
After his son’s suicide, a debt-ridden farmer seeks justice from the government. But as his pleas are mocked and rebuffed, his own will to live erodes.
When a busy entrepreneur pauses her career to spend time with her aging father, both learn valuable lessons on happiness, love and living in the moment.
As a visually impaired man attempts to rescue his love interest from a serial killer, the dark story behind the murderer’s disturbing psyche emerges.
A notorious terrorist manipulates an Indian army major's jilted lover into helping him obtain a classified military code.
During a time of political turmoil, a mother goes on a journey in search of her missing son, who has been misjudged and labeled a terrorist.
An aspiring music director begins to receive voyeuristic footage of his girlfriend from her apparent stalker as tragedy strikes those around him.
Matters of the heart introduce chaos into the once-idyllic bachelor existence of three young men who share an apartment.
Three young bachelors find the reality of relationships to be far removed from the idea of true romance that they had once pursued.
A commitment-phobe agrees to marry his girlfriend, setting in motion a series of hilarious mishaps that has him questioning what he got himself into.
Twins separated by a court order meet at camp and decide to reunite their parents, unaware of the dark secret that drove them apart years before.
After reluctantly joining a dating app, a 35-year-old widow accompanies an easygoing poet on a trip to visit three of his exes.
When an abusive landowner is murdered, his twin brother sets out to find the killer but quickly discovers that everyone, it seems, wanted him dead.
A young villager moves to Chandigarh and falls for his bubbly neighbor, but their love story is affected by several heartbreaking twists of fate.
Dumped by her fiancé, a sheltered young woman decides to go on her honeymoon to Europe alone, embarking on an exhilarating journey of self-discovery.
Things look up for a Chennai man struggling to make ends meet when he falls for a politician’s daughter – until he gets entangled in a murder case.
When the American-educated scion of a powerful Indian family returns to the subcontinent, his first taste of power starts him down a corrupt path.
When a newly married landlord is murdered, a misfit cop’s investigation is complicated by the victim’s secretive family and his own conflicted heart.
The plot thickens around two horse-racing competitors when three beautiful women come into their lives and a murder is committed.
In this sequel set in the world of horse racing, half-brothers Ranvir and Rajiv Singh return for another complex tale of love, greed and violence.
An elderly, hearing-impaired Indian man stays connected to the world of the past through the beloved valve radio he has owned since childhood.
After street smart kid Raees rises to become Gujarat's bootlegging king in the 1980s, he tries to balance his life of crime with helping his people.
A couple out to have a sensuous weekend at a house outside of Mumbai finds it rigged with surveillance cameras and occupied by an evil entity.
The horror continues when Ragini's video goes viral and a sleazy director decides to make a movie about the incident in the original house.
The murder of a teenage girl found dead in her bedroom opens up a twisted investigation that leads into a dark, murky labyrinth of secrets and lies.
Mistreated by his cruel uncle, an imaginative orphan with autism sees hope when a fairy vows to change his life with a week of enchanted recipes.
When a poor taxi driver falls in love with a wealthy young woman, he must stand up to her family and contend with his own insecurities.
A small-time con man assembles a team to help him avenge the death of his partner-in-crime at the hands of a powerful gangster.
Hoping to revive his relationship with his resentful millennial son, an internet-rookie widower assumes the online persona of a young woman.
A grad student leaves her boyfriend in Delhi for a job interview in Mumbai, where she reconnects with an old flame for whom she still has feelings.
An asylum patient’s troubled past threatens his grasp on reality as fellow hospital residents begin disappearing at the hands of an unknown entity.
Two boyhood pals – one righteous, the other a criminal – take very different paths to adulthood. Their love for the same woman may prove disastrous.
Abandoned by her new husband and father of her son, a mountain woman journeys to Calcutta to find him, constantly tested by social evils along the way.
A corrupt cop and a serial killer obsessed with a psychopath from the '60s get caught up in a ruthless cat-and-mouse game in this Indian thriller.
A small-town cook moves to London to earn a living, but from his employer’s sudden death to the immigration officials on his trail, plans soon go sour.
Believing himself to be God's envoy, a troubled young man embarks on a killing spree as his passion for music becomes a psychotic obsession.
An idealistic English filmmaker casts a group of student actors in her docudrama about India's revolution against British rule in the 1920s.
During World War II, daredevil star Miss Julia entertains soldiers at the Indo-Burma border, where she's caught up in a web of love and deceit.
Bollywood superstar Salman Khan plays Prem, an heir to a perfume fortune who falls in love with the wrong woman in this romantic comedy.
A struggling fighter-turned-promoter reconnects with his estranged son to convert an old-generation robot into a mighty World Robot Boxing contender.
When a theater group stages a production of a Rabindranath Tagore play, they begin to notice parallels between the story and their own lives.
After four years together, a husband and wife become entangled in secret, sexually charged relationships that threaten to unravel their marriage.
Desperate to save his land, an indebted farmer journeys to Pandharpur to seek divine blessing with his small son, who searches for his mother.
A heartbroken wildlife photographer throws himself into his work, only to find himself experiencing strange transformations.
In a village where girls are auctioned off rather than married, a man falls in love with a girl who is about to face the bidders.
As communal violence erupts in his neighborhood, a Muslim mechanic presses forward to repair a historic truck that will transport Gandhi’s last remains.
Four friends hoped that their rock band would be a hit. After breaking up, the band members reunite and take another shot at fulfilling their dream.
A reclusive pawn shop owner sets his sights on revenge when vicious gangsters kidnap his drug-addicted neighbor's young daughter.
In 1971, a fallen army major’s son is tapped by India's Research and Analysis Wing to serve as an undercover agent in Pakistan in the lead-up to war.
Two common boys travel from India to Thailand to find success and money, enjoying their friendship and finding ways to cheat the cheats.
In rural India, a child with hydrocephalus gets a chance at life-changing surgery after her photos go viral. This documentary charts her journey.
A con man uncovers a deadly secret and must save his lady love, the little girl who insists she's his daughter and the small-town locals from the mob.
Following the untimely death of his father, a young man begins to reconnect with his family while uncovering some difficult truths.
Siddharth falls in love with beautiful Jhanvi. But Jhanvi's brother Ganpat is overly possessive – and determined to destroy their relationship.
A Bihari migrant runs a successful service to help couples elope, until the daughter of his former boss stirs the pot.
A decorated naval officer kills his wife's lover, leading to a sensational trial and a national obsession over passion versus premeditated murder.
Three old friends who have always hated politics are in for a shock when the friend who dislikes politics the most is somehow elected head minister.
In a fictional megalopolis, a stunning underworld theft triggers a fierce power struggle among the gangsters, with an enigmatic cop on their trail.
A young woman falls for her classmate’s idealistic, non-materialistic ways, but is troubled upon seeing his principles change after they marry.
In rural India, a detective's investigation of seven confounding suicides uncovers revelations about the myths and mindsets of the rest of the village.
In this madcap comedy, two mischievous cats, a talking parrot and a high-strung dog keep getting into trouble while their human is away.
A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.
After a traumatic injury leaves her with amnesia and age regression, a young woman is sold to a brothel before a teacher becomes her savior.
This documentary profiles the celebrated Hindi film director known as much for his embrace of leftist politics and social concerns as lyrical cinema.
A charming cabbie, a cop turned assassin and a housewife who’s also a hooker share one thing in common: a bizarre and violent afternoon in Kolkata.
Knotty love triangles and nefarious schemes arise when a nobleman’s plans to remarry fall into the cunning hands of his first wife and a vengeful rival.
When two college students – a rich man’s daughter and a fisherman’s son – defy social edicts by falling in love, violence erupts in their village.
Caught in a downward spiral of failed career moves, misguided ambitions and bad relations, a pair of lost souls find hope in an unexpected friendship.
Two close childhood friends take drastically different paths in life, but meet by chance years later and fall in love, unaware of their past bond.
On a family visit, a young man and his girlfriend set out to discover why his eccentric uncle has been mysteriously confined to one room for years.
When a young girl is killed in a suspicious train accident, three very different lives become intertwined in their quest for answers.

In an effort to honor the family matriarch's dying wish, Urmila and her husband, Shrikant, embark on a quest to find a husband for charismatic yet choosey Sai. But some things are easier said than done.
Returning home from war after being assumed dead, a pilot weds the woman he has long loved, unaware that she had been planning to marry his best friend.
From the depths of addiction to the heights of stardom to underworld entanglements, this biopic traces the checkered past of Indian actor Sanjay Dutt.
Passed off as spies, two inept pals are sent to Fiji to rescue a kidnapped bureaucrat. Soon enough, they’re creating more problems than they’re solving.
A simple farmer's life becomes complicated after he resolves to save his village from an economic crisis by traveling to Australia to earn money.

Raised in working-class Mumbai, Manisha has an independent spirit that angers her father, who favors Manisha's medical student sister, Mini. Things reach a breaking point when Manisha's father beats her for accepting a modeling contract.
An aspiring musician battles age-old caste divides to be able to learn the art of a classical instrument from a traditionalist, veteran percussionist.
In the course of a human trafficking investigation, a conservative cop crosses paths with an artist-activist in a clash of worldviews.
After several failed attempts to obtain a visa, a man desperate to escape Punjab pays a British woman to marry him so he can move to England.
Based on true events, this moving story centers on a Punjabi family whose celebration of their faith endures in the face of conflicting attitudes.
Friends in their last year of college contemplate the future of their band as they juggle questions of love, work, family and identity.
The eldest of seven brothers who run a family farm together marries a pretty nurse, inspiring his country-bumpkin siblings to follow his example.
In this Bollywood drama, a corporate go-getter sees his priorities shift when personal tragedy brings him face-to-face with political corruption.
When his wife begins to exhibit alarming behavior, a husband tries to find whether she suffers from a personality disorder or something more sinister.
A talented teenage singer-songwriter living amid domestic abuse becomes a YouTube sensation after a video in which she hides her identity goes viral.
An aspiring yet aimless actor takes over his ailing father's job as an ambulance driver, unwittingly getting involved in an organ-trafficking network.
When a slum dweller spins a web of lies in pursuit of the upward mobility he has long craved, his ruse could be especially dangerous for his young son.
Meeting after many years, a makeup artist and her grandmother revisit tensions from an old family feud that still hang heavy between them.
Asked to deliver a package for a friend, Madhu gets her fiancé, Jayaganthan, to take care of it, and he then passes the task to one of his roommates.
When a novelist seeks inspiration by urging his wife to have an affair, the line between his story and his real life grows disconcertingly blurry.
At large in the city, five inmates of a mental asylum run up against the insanity of the outside world while trying to prevent a terrorist plot.
When they're blackmailed after a hit-and-run, a troubled rich girl and her wild friends stage a fake kidnapping with a plan to collect the ransom.
A young mother must break free of the clutches of her husband's feudal family and bring herself and her young child to safety.
Three disparate characters uncover government corruption as a small Indian town receives an influx of foreign money to turn it into the next Shanghai.
Unable to bribe his way out of a reckless driving charge, an arrogant rich kid is sentenced to community service at a home for senior citizens.
Courtroom intrigue plays out against a backdrop of military secrets in this Bollywood drama with a plot that's reminiscent of A Few Good Men.
When Shankar, who performs on the road with partner Chanchal and elephant Appu, falls for a Russian circus performer, jealousies and conflicts arise.
A young man who gets tongue-tied around women writes a love letter to his crush, but it ends up in the hands of her mother, who thinks it's for her.
A young man enrolls at a college and becomes a rival to the student-union president, who’s using force and intimidation to advance his criminal agenda.
An older woman's unique friendship with a young boy inspires her to examine the strained relationship she shares with her married son.

Based on a true story, this action film follows an incident that stunned a nation in the early 1990s. In Mumbai, India, the notorious gangster Maya holds off veteran cop Khan and a force of more than 200 policemen in a six-hour bloody gunfight.
When three small-time Mumbai crooks steal a bag on a train, they find that it's filled with weapons and realize that their lives may be in danger.
A Hindu boy's feelings for a Muslim girl expose the tensions between their two communities and open the door to chaos and violence.
Unexpected wildlife adventures and valuable life lessons await seven city kids when they suddenly become lost in the forest during a school field trip.
As her own wedding looms on the horizon, a marriage counselor strives to save her future in-laws' crumbling relationship.
An American woman on a revenge mission travels to India and befriends two journalists seeking justice for violent crimes against women.
A principled mathematics teacher is shocked to discover that his grandson used unethical means to achieve academic success.
A policeman's son overcomes his reluctance to join the force following a brutal attack on his father and ends up in the middle of a robbery case.
From first crushes to post-marriage relationships, love and connection are at the heart of the four interwoven stories in this anthology film.
When his employee disappears in Singapore, Shyam travels from India to investigate the absence and becomes entangled in a deadly plot.
As the result of a TV journalist's curiosity, the amazing saga of an honorable government tax collector's past comes to light.
A police inspector kills himself after a powerful gangster frames him for corruption – but soon the thug faces the full force of cop Bajirao Singham.
An arranged marriage becomes a friendship for Viren and Aditi, who aren't in love – until they begin having unexpected feelings for each other.
After being violently separated from the woman he loves, a young man must disguise himself in order to keep meeting her.
On the run from Indian police, a mysterious man escapes to Australia and falls in love with the daughter of an Indian criminal who lives there.
Seven strangers anxiously waiting for their HIV test results decide to bribe the clinic receptionist to get them early, learning one is positive.
While fighting crimes against women in Delhi, a short-fused policewoman and her level-headed female boss grapple with gender issues in their own lives.
This biopic on former Indian field hockey player Sandeep Singh follows the athlete’s hard-fought comeback after an accidental gunshot left him paralyzed.
In this fact-based crime drama, a gang of con artists posing as government officials executes a heist in the form of a raid on a prominent jeweler.
When an Intelligence Bureau officer’s phone-tapping day job leads him to a serial killer, he must track down and thwart the murderer’s next steps.
In post-Partition Kolkata, a young Bengali poet from an urban colony wanders the city in search of the woman he loves and a channel for his sorrows.
The writings of Nobel Prize winner Rabindranath Tagore come to life in this collection of tales set in early-20th-century Bengal.
When an astrologer gives him one year to find a mate or face being alone forever, a professor sets out to find a bride despite serious obstacles.
Once a year, men in a small town fear abduction by an eccentric female spirit. A young tailor dismisses the idea of the ghost – until he falls for her.
When a soccer club manager brings one of his injured foreign players home to recuperate, they form an unlikely bond despite their cultural differences.
A trio of filmmakers treks across India to explore the correlation between vanishing rivers, massive energy projects and renewable energy sources.
While investigating a child kidnapping, a Mumbai police inspector is haunted by a shadowy dream figure and memories of his own abducted daughter.
Hoping to find a magical root, a monster has captured farmers in the land of Vyom. It’s up to Bheem and the gang to foil his plan and save the kingdom!
Sex, stigma and spirituality merge in these eccentric stories of an angsty teenager, an unfaithful wife and a transgender woman returning to her past.
A loving, concerned American grandson travels to Mumbai to rescue his unappreciated grandmother from her drudgery and fulfill her true potential.
A group of small-town students goes for glory by competing in a statewide kabaddi tournament 25 years after their school's championship victory.
A renowned music teacher mentors a promising young singer, but when her fame begins to overshadow his own, he lets jealousy and competition take over.
An Americanized NASA scientist returns to his native India on a business trip and searches for the nanny who helped raise him.
After she enters into an arranged marriage, a spirited and intellectual young woman tries to adjust to life with a man who was not her choice.
Businessman Manav falls for aspiring singer Mansi, but their romance faces an uphill climb when Manav must depart and Mansi's suave manager moves in.
When daydreamer Ishaan is sent to boarding school, an unconventional art teacher tries to help the imaginative student discover his true identity.
After his family's donkey is confiscated by a moneylender, 8-year-old Tahaan travels across conflict-torn Kashmir to find his beloved pet.
Set in the jumbled landscape of Mumbai, this mystery drama centers on a police inspector who's trying to cope with the collapse of his marriage.
A man and a woman on the run from the law are drawn to each other through the common bond of their mutual dependency.
Meeting while on vacation, Ved and Tara sense a connection but vow to keep their real identities a secret. Years later, their paths cross again.
When London-based doctor Manu reluctantly returns to India to find a bride, he meets the girl of his dreams – only to discover she loves another man.
A traditional man and an independent woman share a connection, but they must learn to navigate their vastly different experiences and expectations.
Still desperate to find his granddaughter nearly a decade after her kidnapping, a devoted grandfather chases a dangerous new lead.
At a 50-year-old house that served as a school, a brothel, and now a home, tales unfold of the residents who have lived there, longing for an escape.

Luck brings together math expert Perci Trachtenberg and obscure genius Venkat Subramaniam in a casino, but the foundations of probability may be utterly altered when their chat leads Subramaniam to try a new theory in the gambling dens of Mumbai.
A flamboyant con artist and his band of gleeful robbers gamble with fate when smugglers hire them to swipe antiques from a speeding train.
Mini isn't eager to wed the rich suitor who's been chosen for her, so she stages her own kidnapping and runs off with a man who works for her father.
New beginnings appear to be on the horizon after a simple country boy forms a bond with a sophisticated urban girl with modern ideas.
This high-octane thriller tells the story of a man on a mission to reclaim what was taken from him and the agent who's determined to stop him.
A hungry fox and three resourceful, surprisingly formidable birds turn the animal kingdom on its head in this lively animated series.
In London, a mysterious blind man named Kenny appears to be an assassin who uses echolocation to kill, but there is more to Kenny than meets the eye.
From controversial cartoonist to powerful Mumbai politician, this biopic maps the meteoric rise of far-right Shiv Sena party founder, Bal Thackeray.
As a tip leads a local politician to his long-estranged son, his daughter has doubts about whether the young man is truly family or just an impostor.
Three cheating husbands end up paying the price for their infidelities when their spouses hire a private detective – who falls for one of the wives.
After being exiled to England as a child, a Punjabi prince struggles to return to his homeland and his Sikh faith in this historical drama.
A charming allegory based on a novella by Ruskin Bond, this visually stunning film from India explores themes of greed, loneliness, longing and loss.
Mind games and mystery abound as a detective investigates the disappearance of a woman’s body from a morgue in this Hindi remake of a Spanish thriller.
A courageous 11-year-old Afghan girl disguises herself as a boy and takes on odd jobs to provide for her family when her father is arrested.
Food-crazed travel junkies journey across India, completing bucket list challenges for a chance to win a once-in-a-lifetime scholarship.
An optimistic farmer is determined to succeed in spite of the lack of rain in his region, and the sinking spirits around him.
Struggling with Mumbai's pressures and private battles with depression, six lives intersect just as they reach a breaking point.
After his daughter is killed by terrorists, a sullen restaurateur seeks the identities of those responsible and travels to Ireland to take vengeance.
After unwittingly using his skills to obtain military secrets, a gambler is pursued by a police officer who happens to be his doppelgänger.
In this Hindi version of "Aval," a young couple's relationship is shaken to its core when a mysterious and troubled family moves into the neighborhood.
A family of Parsi musicians collectively works for over 60 years scoring the orchestral soundtracks for some of Bollywood's most memorable films.
A chef and his family leave India to open an eatery in the south of France, where they clash with the haughty restaurateur across the street.
A royal prince arrives on an island of fascist rule and inspires a rebellion among its women in this hallucinogenic adaptation of a classic play.
A piece of unexploded ordnance wreaks havoc on the lives of a scrapyard worker whose truck it falls into and an anti-war activist who's hunting for it.
This biopic chronicles the life and times of iconic Indian revolutionary Bhagat Singh, who led an armed resistance against the British in the 1920.
After a life of crime, a notorious kidnapper tries to change his ways and turn over a new leaf to win the heart of the woman he loves.
When a lazy young man replaces his father as the elevator operator of a posh residential complex, what he sees as menial work soon takes on new meaning.
Leveraging his ability to withstand pain, a young man trains to follow in the footsteps of his martial-arts hero in this high-action, meta comedy.
After being sent to a remote prison, three young men suffer under the watchful eye of their jailer and make a meticulous plan to escape.
Examine the troublesome coexistence of humans and rodents in Mumbai, where the byproducts of a big economy have led to a thriving rat population.
Knocked down by life one too many times, a meek family man drastically transforms from shy to savage after an encounter with a mysterious friend.
Three sexually frustrated men in their 60s have the adventure of a lifetime after meeting an intriguing young woman during a holiday in Mauritius.
After succumbing to her terminal illness, a teenager posthumously narrates her parents’ tenacious relationship in this drama based on a true story.
What was supposed to be a peaceful protest turned into a violent clash with the police. What followed was one of the most notorious trials in history.
An unemployed Bollywood session violinist in Mumbai finally lands a small gig, but it's what happens on his way home that proves truly transformative.
Five children living on the edge of a forest band together to save a magical wishing tree from destruction and find their own paths to happiness.
A goofy copywriter unwittingly convinces the Indian cricket team that she’s their lucky mascot, to the dismay of their superstition-shunning captain.
An auto rickshaw driver harbors a deep affection for a young woman, but his troubled past threatens to stand between them.
When shy Kumar gets stuck on the losing end of a love triangle, the Love Doctor, Mokia, has a strategy for Kumar to win the love of his life.
In a South Indian village, a centenarian's funeral brings together his free-spirited son, inheritance-hungry grandson and girl-crazy great-grandson.
When his partner in crime goes missing, a small-time crook’s life is transformed as he dedicates himself to raising the daughter his friend left behind.
A get-rich-quick scheme goes awry when a group of friends stumbles onto a dangerous conspiracy and wind up getting mistaken for the bad guys.
Imprisoned for drug smuggling as a child, a young man uses the law he studied while in jail to take revenge on those who wronged him.
Two frustrated sex workers cut out the middlemen from their business affairs and start a cooperative that's run entirely by women.
Raised in the privileged bubble of Delhi's elite, a teen is compelled to question his outlook on life and love when his older brother comes out as gay.
Personality differences, an old friend and a past flame poke holes in the way a husband and wife perceive their marriage.
A scheming matriarch plots to cut off her disabled stepson and his wife from the family fortune, creating a division within the clan.
On her first day of marriage, a woman leaves her husband upon learning his home lacks a toilet, sparking a quixotic quest to acquire modern sanitation.
The tales of an eccentric aristocrat, a tightrope walking nomad and a postman-turned-soothsayer unspool in this visual poem of rural life in India.
At an Afghanistan refugee camp, an ex-army doctor seeks to bring children joy through cricket — and soon realizes that the stakes go beyond the sport.
Exasperated with living in perpetual fear for their safety, four women kidnap a man to show him the realities of being female in Delhi.
Four characters coexist at an urban traffic signal, where all manage to make a meager living until events threaten the source of their livelihood.
A Goan native returns to his now-derelict, palatial childhood home, recalling his family’s interpersonal drama during the end of Portuguese rule.
After being framed, a policewoman languishing in prison hopes that her three sons will deliver justice and restore her honor.
To amuse themselves, six college friends decide to pay a visit to a fortress believed by some to be the most haunted place in Asia.
A taxi driver living in a Mumbai slum seeks to better his family's life by building an extension of his home while dealing with a lecherous contractor.
When their Sunday soccer game on the beach is canceled, five friends set out to find another place to play in the noisy, crowded city of Mumbai.
Expecting to relax at their "vacation" cabin, two backwoods boys see their trip turn into a nightmare when they're accused of being psychotic killers.
A child whose innocence and devotion set him apart from the other children of his village grows up to be one of the foremost saints of India.
An astute but old-fashioned law clerk steps up to help the owner of a cafe in a legal battle that has both business and personal ramifications.
A reporter must hunt for the truth behind a strange murder after she crosses paths with a young cop and becomes the investigation's prime suspect.
Upon returning to his industrial hometown, a young man must decide whether to follow his own dreams or acquiesce to his father's plans for his future.
Drug abuse and the darker side of Punjab rear their heads in the intense, interwoven tales of a cop, a doctor, a migrant worker and a rock star.
When a 10-year-old goes missing while her father, an actor, is out on an audition, the girl's stepfather – Mumbai's police chief – leads the search.
Everyday guy Kabir is thrown for a loop when he meets Kuhu, a freewheeling party girl. Now, he's a changed man, dancing, running half-naked through the streets and donning ladies' shoes at her whim.
An honest man dreams of a better life for his family, but a childhood friend leads him into a world of crime that keeps happiness just out of reach.
Defeated and humiliated in a fight while trying to defuse a conflict among his fellow villagers, a photographer vows revenge on his attacker.
An ambitious man leaves his small Indian village for America. But when his letters to home stop coming, his brother sets out on his own adventure.
After the brutal murders of their loved ones, three individuals share how they healed through forgiveness in this documentary presented by Aamir Khan.
An undercover cop finds himself in a strange position after infiltrating a "gang" that pulls wildly popular pranks on corrupt officials in Mumbai.
Toxic conditions and a corrupt union leader prompt a chemical plant worker and earnest family man to fight for justice for his fellow laborers.
Hoping to do good while making millions, three college graduates create a startup. But as business begins to flourish, their own bond starts to fray.
When a chemical plant's poor conditions cause tragedies, an employee leads a protest against the company’s callous owner and local politicians.
After getting tricked into working at a brothel, a medical student joins forces with two of her co-workers to fight their unscrupulous exploiters.
An aspiring pilot fights for her future – and justice – after surviving an acid attack from her abusive boyfriend.
Shyam wakes to discover he's suspected in a murder that one journalist believes may have ties to a mysterious gangster.
At an apartment complex, the lives of a mother, a daughter seeking an arranged marriage, a military retiree and a young man become intertwined.
A police official assembles an elaborate network of spies and undercover operatives to bring down a ruthless bandit with a private army.
Quick to throw punches in the name of justice, a young man must find a calmer way to win over the pacifist father of the girl he wishes to marry.
This powerful Tamil action film follows the shared fate of two very different siblings: policeman Thiru and his roguish brother, Guru.
As viceroy Lord Mountbatten arrives in Delhi to oversee a transfer of power from Britain to India in 1947, war looms between religious factions.
From the Vedas to Vasco da Gama to vacuous Bollywood plotlines, comedian Vir Das celebrates the history of India with his one-of-a-kind perspective.
Stage banter takes on a different — deeper — meaning as the comedian performs online shows to homebound viewers worldwide from his Mumbai residence.
A man is disheartened when he visits his well-to-do son and grandkids in Australia and sees they have detached from their traditional Indian morals.
When a mother and her daughter arrive to stay in his home in Kerala, a young Muslim man becomes torn between love, faith and clashing political views.
In a remote village in colonial India, an old man and his grandson display strong differences in their attitudes toward the country's British rulers.
Set up for an arranged marriage, a young couple enjoys an old-fashioned courtship, until an accident days before their wedding tests their nascent love.
While investigating a series of murders and the nightclub that links them, a detective’s case takes an alarming turn when his wife goes missing.
Frustrated with the stalled investigation into her husband's murder, a woman searches for the killer on her own, putting herself in grave danger.
In a modern adaptation of a mythological tale, a devoted wife is willing to do whatever it takes to rescue her husband from the clutches of death.
While visiting his comatose wife in the hospital, a serene old professor befriends a vibrant young woman whose husband has also fallen into a coma.
A spoiled trust fund brat finds himself stuck in a rut of meaningless late-night parties – until he meets a significantly older woman and writer.
Set in an India-Pakistan border post, this satirical but thought-provoking comedy about war deals with serious events in a humorous manner.
During World War I, the bond between a young Englishman and his loyal horse, Joey, is tested when Joey is sold to the cavalry and sent to France.
Rushing to pay off a loan shark, a young man breaks into a bungalow to steal the cash, unprepared for the dog standing guard – or the trouble inside.
Six young women, who each live near one of Earth's major rivers, share how the Waterschool environmental education program has impacted their lives.
Helping an amputee grandmaster settle the score for his tragic past, a grieving detective unravels a conspiracy more complicated than he imagined.
A divorced mother of three children runs a happy household – until her former husband brings his new career-oriented girlfriend into the picture.
In this silly Bollywood farce, the brothers of a Mafia princess set out on a comical mission to marry their sister into a respectable family.
Denied a U.S. visa, two dim Indian men decide to sneak into America on a boat. Fate, however, leaves them stranded on a beach – in Karachi, Pakistan.
An educated man assists the illiterate residents of his village with written correspondence, sometimes manipulating the letters to suit his interests.
On leave in his drought-ridden village to find his daughter a husband, a father becomes mired in the bribery-laced bureaucracy of his local government.
When two unlikely friends play hooky from school, accidental encounters and otherworldly events turn their day into a whimsical coming-of-age journey.
A crabby woman leaves home for a vacation and entrusts her niece's fiancé to feed her fish and adhere to a strict set of rules. He has other ideas.
A peasant from Punjab and his best friend pose as detectives, filmmakers and more while trying to retrieve stolen money in this romantic comedy.
To protect his family from ruin, Yogesh must marry his dream girl in only ten days, so he rushes into dating women with different astrological signs.
A small-town taxi driver is arranged to be married, resulting in an intimate look at the clash between modernity and tradition in India.
Pressured by his traditional family to marry, a filmmaker explores the idea of monogamy and the possibility of lifelong union without sexual fidelity.
When his frustrated girlfriend decides to leave him, a struggling writer gets down to work on stories of romance he hopes will win her back.
The life of a chauffeur and part-time bootlegger takes a turn toward the dramatic when a girl approaches him to buy illicit alcohol.
When a middle-aged filmmaker meets an alluring stranger at a party, he's haunted by troubling memories of his past relationships.

The lives of a middle-aged soap opera addict, an ambitious career woman, a fervent activist and nine others from different walks of Indian life intersect in Mumbai. But this vibrant melting pot threatens to bubble over with bias and bigotry.
Two young lovers set out to overcome the obstacles that stand in the way of their marriage, beginning with the objections of the girl's father.
When his brother becomes involved in a deadly bank robbery, a heartbroken cop vows to track down and retrieve his wayward sibling – dead or alive.
The patriarch of a wealthy family with one industrious son and one who's a playboy arranges for the marriage of one to the woman the other loves.
Up to his old tricks, con man Dharam poses as a millionaire to get his younger son married to the daughter of a wealthy businessman.

Thanks to an arranged marriage that was designed to make an ailing grandmother happy, newlyweds Rahul and Swati are virtually strangers. Can a four-day honeymoon make a difference when it comes to the couple's feelings about each other?
Discovered by an eccentric ballet master, two gifted but underprivileged Mumbai teens face bigotry and disapproval as they pursue their dancing dreams.
Revisiting life goals set in a letter written as a teen to his future self, comedian Kanan Gill reports back on if he's lived up to his own expectations.
An accident on a bridge ties together three young men from different social classes, sparking a course of events that will forever alter their lives.
A philandering small-town mechanic's political ambitions are sparked when the visiting prime minister mistakenly grants him special security clearance.
A change in the leadership of a political party sparks bitter conflict and the party's division into two rival factions.
Through his relationships with two wildly different women, a vertically challenged bachelor with a larger-than-life persona must discover his purpose.
Three friends on an adventurous road trip/bachelor party in Spain learn some lessons about themselves and each other that will change them forever.
When his cruel uncle abandons him, a young orphan learns to access the untapped superpowers that have been waiting within him all along.
A drug dealer starts having doubts about his trade as his brother, his client, and two rappers from the slums each battle their own secret addictions.
A scrappy but poor boy worms his way into a tycoon's dysfunctional family, while facing his fear of music and the truth about his past.
